value.info_text:
You merge your mind with the rest of the Way for a brief moment; the sum of all yeek knowledge gathers in your mind

and allows you to identify any item you could not recognize yourself.
value.name: Knowledge of the Way

value2.info_text:
You merge your mind with the rest of the Way for a brief moment; the sum of all yeek knowledge gathers in your mind,

and allows you to identify any item you could not recognize yourself.
value2.name: Knowledge of the Way

value.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Sun, in the form of three defensive Chants.

Chant of Fortitude: Increases your mental save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6 and maximum life by 7%.

Chant of Fortress: Increases your physical save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your physical resistance by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%, your armour by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and your armour hardiness by 15%.

Chant of Resistance: Increases you spell save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your fire/cold/lightning/acid resistances by 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3% and reduces all damage that comes from distant enemies (3 spaces or more) by -6%.

You may only have one Chant active at a time.
value.name: Chant Acolyte

value2.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Sun, in the form of three defensive Chants.

Chant of Fortitute: Increases your mental save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6 and maximum life by 7%.

Chant of Fortress: Increases your physical save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your physical resistance by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%, your armour by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and your armour hardiness by 10%.

Chant of Resistance: Increases you spell save by 0, 1, 3, 4, 6, your fire/cold/lightning/acid resistances by 0%, 0%, 1%, 2%, 3% and reduces all damage that comes from distant enemies (3 spaces or more) by -6%.

You may only have one Chant active at a time.
value2.name: Chant Acolyte

value.info_text:
Your passion for singing the praises of the Sun reaches its zenith.

Your Chanting now increases your light and fire damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and up to 0, 1, 2, 3, 3 times per turn, when you are hit by a weapon attack, you will gain 2.3, 3.5, 4.4, 5.1, 5.8 Positive.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chant Radiant

value2.info_text:
Your passion for singing the praises of the Sun reaches its zenith.

Your Chanting now increases your light and fire damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and increases your positive energy regeneration by 0.10, 0.22, 0.32, 0.41, 0.50 per turn.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Chant Radiant

value.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle lights up affected tiles, increases your positive energy by 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 each turn, and deals 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 light damage and 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 fire damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Circle of Blazing Light

value.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle increases your defense and all saves by 18, 25, 30, 35, 38 while dealing 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 darkness damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Circle of Shifting Shadows

value2.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle increases your Defense by 18, 25, 30, 35, 38, and deals 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 darkness damage per turn to everyone else with in its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Circle of Shifting Shadows

value.info_text: Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle protects you from silence effects while you remain in its radius while silencing and dealing 18, 25, 30, 35, 38 light damage to everyone else who enters. The circle lasts 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.
value.name: Circle of Sanctity

value2.info_text: Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle protects you from silence effects while you remain in its radius, and silences everyone else who enters. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.
value2.name: Circle of Sanctity

value.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 61%, 83%, 100%, 114%, 127% and attempts to push all creatures other than yourself out of its radius, inflicting 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage and 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Circle of Warding

value2.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle slows incoming projectiles by 61%, 83%, 100%, 114%, 127%, and attempts to push all creatures other than yourself out of its radius, inflicting 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 light damage and 12, 17, 20, 23, 26 darkness damage per turn as it does so. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Circle of Warding

value.info_text:
Conjure a surge of celestial power through your circles. Any foe standing within one of your circles will be slowed by 50% for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns and take 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 light and 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 darkness damage.

Residual power from the surge will emanate from your circles for 2, 6, 8, 10, 10 turns; each circle you stand in will increase your celestial resources.

Shifting Shadows: +1 negative.

Sanctity: +1 postive.

Warding: +0.5 postive and negative.
value.name: Celestial Surge

value.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, adding 23, 44, 60, 73, 85 light damage on each melee hit.

Additionally, if you have a temporary damage shield active, melee hits will increase its power by 22, 43, 59, 73, 85 once per turn.

The damage dealt and shield bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Weapon of Light

value2.info_text:
Infuse your weapon with the power of the Sun, adding 23, 44, 60, 73, 85 light damage on each melee hit.

Additionally, if you have a temporary damage shield active, melee attacks will increase its power by 11, 21, 29, 36, 42.

If the same shield is refreshed 20 times it will become unstable and explode, removing it.

The damage dealt and shield bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Weapon of Light

value.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 28%, 62%, 74%, 80%, 84% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.

The bonus damage can only occur once per turn.
value.name: Weapon of Wrath

value2.info_text:
Your weapon attacks burn with righteous fury, dealing 28%, 62%, 74%, 80%, 84% of your lost HP as additional Fire damage (up to 277, 376, 452, 517, 575, Current: 0).

Targets struck are also afflicted with a Martyrdom effect that causes them to take 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28% of all damage they deal for 4 turns.
value2.name: Weapon of Wrath

value.info_text: You mark a target with light for 3 turns, causing all melee hits you deal to it to heal you for 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% of the damage done.
value.name: Mark of Light

value2.info_text: You mark a target with light for 5 turns, causing all melee hits you deal to it to heal you for 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% of the damage done.
value2.name: Mark of Light

value.info_text:
Infuse your two handed weapon with light while spinning around.

All creatures in radius one take 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage.

In addition while spinning your weapon shines so much it deals 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% light weapon damage to all foes in radius 2.

At level 4 your spinning blade creates a shield that blocks all damage for 1 turn.
value.name: Flash of the Blade

value2.info_text:
Infuse your two handed weapon with light while spinning around.

All creatures in radius one take 90%, 107%, 120%, 131%, 141% weapon damage.

In addition while spinning your weapon shines so much it deals 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% light weapon damage to all foes in radius 2.

At level 4 your spinning blade creates a shield that blocks all damage for 1 turn.
value2.name: Flash of the Blade

value.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 26%, 39%, 49%, 55%, 61% for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 3, 4, 5, 6, 6.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
value.name: Totality

value2.info_text:
Increases your light and darkness resistance penetration by 26%, 39%, 49%, 55%, 61% for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, and reduces the cooldown of all Celestial skills by 3, 4, 5, 6, 6.

The resistance penetration will increase with your Cunning.
value2.name: Totality

value.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 targets within radius 6, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 light damage or 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.

This spell cannot crit.
value.name: Corona

value2.info_text:
Each time one of your spells criticals, you project a bolt of light or shadow at up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 targets within radius 6, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 light damage or 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage per bolt.

This effect costs 2 positive or 2 negative energy each time it's triggered, and will not activate if either your positive or negative energy is below 2.

The damage scales with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Corona

value.info_text: Shroud foes within radius 10 in darkest light, dealing 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 light and 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage per turn and converting 15%, 32%, 45%, 56%, 66% of the damage they deal between light and darkness for 5 turns.
value.name: Darkest Light

value2.info_text:
This powerful spell grants you 21, 29, 34, 38, 43 bonus invisibility, but converts 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 negative energy into positive energy each turn. Once your positive energy exceeds your negative energy, or you deactivate the talent, the effect ends in an explosion of light, converting all of your positive energy into damage and inflicting an additional 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 damage to everything in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality; all your damage is reduced by 50%.

You may not cast Twilight while this spell is active, and you should take off your light source; otherwise, others will spot you with ease.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Cunning, and the explosion damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Darkest Light

value.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be dazed for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
value.name: Glyph of Paralysis

value.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be hit by a blast that does 38, 54, 66, 77, 86 physical damage and knocks them back.

The glyph is a hidden trap (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Glyph of Repulsion

value.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will trigger an explosion of light that does 43, 64, 79, 92, 103 damage to everyone within 1 tile.

The glyph is a hidden trap (30, 43, 52, 61, 68 detection and 30, 43, 52, 61, 68 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Glyph of Explosion

value.info_text:
You bind light in a glyph on the floor. All enemies walking over the glyph will be slowed by 21%, 26%, 31%, 35%, 39% for 5 turns.

The glyph is a hidden trap (38, 54, 66, 76, 85 detection and 38, 54, 66, 76, 85 disarm power based on your Magic) and lasts for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.
value.name: Glyph of Fatigue

value.info_text:
When one of your spells goes critical, you bind glyphs in radius 1 centered on a random target in range 10 at the cost of 5 positive and 5 negative energy.

Glyphs last for 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns and cause various effects when an enemy enters their grid.

Glyphs will only spawn on enemies that aren't adjacent to an existing glyph and will prioritize your own position if it is valid.

This can only happen every 4 game turns.

Glyph effects will scale with your Spellpower.

Avalable glyphs are:

Glyph of Sunlight: Bind sunlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a brilliant light, dealing 0.00 light damage and healing you for 65, 89, 107, 122, 136.

Glyph of Moonlight: Bind moonlight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a fatiguing darkness, dealing 0.00 darkness damage and reducing the foes damage dealt by 52%, 70%, 84%, 97%, 100% for 2 turns.

Glyph of Twilight: Bind twilight into a glyph. When triggered it will release a burst of twilight, dealing 0.00 light and 0.00 darkness damage and knocking the foe back 1 tiles.
value.name: Glyphs

value.info_text:
Your glyphs are imbued with celestial fury; they last 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns longer and when triggered they will deal damage.

Glyph of Sunlight: Deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 light damage.

Glyph of Moonlight: Deals 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 darkness damage.

Glyph of Twilight: Deals 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 light and 33, 45, 54, 61, 68 darkness damage.
value.name: Glyphs of Fury

value.info_text: Up to 3 times per turn when one of your glyphs triggers you feel a surge of celestial power, increasing your darkness and light resistance and affinity by 5% for 2, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns, stacking up to 2, 4, 4, 5, 5 times.
value.name: Empowered Glyphs

value.info_text:
Destabilize your glyphs, triggering every glyph in radius 10 with an enemy standing on it.

At talent level 2 glyphs triggered this way will leave a residue of themselves on the ground, dealing damage each turn for 0, 2, 3, 5, 6 turns.

Sunlight: 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 light damage.

Moonlight: 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 darkness damage.

Twilight: 23, 31, 37, 42, 47 light and 23, 31, 37, 42, 47 darkness damage
value.name: Destabilize Glyphs

value.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 140%, 157%, 170%, 181%, 191% damage, and with a shield strike doing 140%, 157%, 170%, 181%, 191% damage. If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Brandish

value2.info_text:
Hits the target with your weapon doing 201%, 244%, 276%, 303%, 328% damage, and with a shield strike doing 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% damage. If the shield strike connects, your shield will explode in a burst of light that inflicts 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 light damage on all targets except yourself within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 of the target, and light up all tiles in that radius.

The light damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Brandish

value.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Moons, in the form of three defensive Hymns:

Hymn of Shadows: Increases your movement speed by 1%, 1%, 3%, 4%, 5% and your spell casting speed by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2%.

Hymn of Detection: Increases your ability to see stealthy creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and invisible creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, and increases your critical power by 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%.

Hymn of Perseverance: Increases your resistance to stun, confusion and blinding by 7%.

You may only have one Hymn active at a time.
value.name: Hymn Acolyte

value2.info_text:
You have learned to sing the praises of the Moons, in the form of three defensive Hymns.

Hymn of Shadows: Increases your movement speed by 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, your spell casting speed by 0%, 0%, 1%, 1%, 2% and grants 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5% evasion.

Hymn of Detection: Increases your ability to see stealthy creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2 and invisible creatures by 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, and increases your critical power by 0%, 1%, 2%, 4%, 5%.

Hymn of Perseverance: Increases your resistance to stun, confusion and blinding by 7%.

value.info_text:
Your Hymns now focus darkness near you, which increases your darkness damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and does 19, 25, 31, 35, 39 darkness damage to anyone who hits you in melee.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn Incantor

value2.info_text:
Your Hymns now focus darkness near you, which increases your darkness damage by 18%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 38% and does 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage to anyone who hits you in melee.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Hymn Incantor

value.info_text:
Your passion for singing the praises of the Moons reaches its zenith.

Your Hymns now fire shadowy beams that will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 damage, with a 20% chance of blinding.

This powerful effect will drain 5.0 negative energy each time it fires at at least 1 target; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn Nocturnalist

value2.info_text:
Your passion for singing the praises of the Moons reaches its zenith, increasing your negative energy regeneration by 0.10, 0.22, 0.32, 0.41, 0.50 per turn.

Your Hymns now fires shadowy beams that will hit up to 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 of your foes within radius 5 for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage, with a 20% chance of blinding.

This powerful effect will drain 4.8, 3.9, 3.4, 2.9, 2.6 negative energy for each beam; no beam will fire if your negative energy is too low.

These values scale with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Hymn Nocturnalist

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, gaining the agility of shadows.

This increases your movement speed by 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% and your spell speed by 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 25%.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Shadows

value2.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, gaining the agility of shadows.

This increases your movement speed by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%, your spell speed by 12%, 16%, 20%, 22%, 25% and grant 19%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 28% evasion.

value2.name: Hymn of Shadows

value.info_text:
Chant the glory of the Moons, granting you stealth detection (+15, +21, +25, +28, +32 power), and invisibility detection (+15, +21, +25, +28, +32 power).

You may also attack creatures you cannot see without penalty and your critical hits do 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% more damage.

You may only have one Hymn active at once.

The stealth and invisibility detection will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hymn of Detection

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
You are so infused with sunlight that your body glows permanently in radius 4, 7, 9, 10, 10, even in dark places.

Your vision adapts to this glow, giving you 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% blindness resistance.

The light radius overrides your normal light if it is bigger (it does not stack).
value.name: Radiance

value2.info_text:
You are so infused with sunlight that your body glows permanently in radius 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, even in dark places.

Your vision adapts to this glow, giving you 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% blindness resistance.

The light radius overrides your normal light if it is bigger (it does not stack).
value2.name: Radiance

value.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage to all non-dazed foes caught inside.

Each enemy effected has a 8%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance of being dazed for 5 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value.name: Searing Sight

value2.info_text:
Your Radiance is so powerful it burns all foes caught in it, doing up to 22, 30, 36, 41, 46 light damage (reduced with distance) to all foes caught inside.

At level 4 the light is so bright it has 7%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 22% chance to daze them for 3 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Searing Sight

value.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 light damage in radius 1 and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt.
value.name: Judgement

value2.info_text: Fire a glowing orb of light at each enemy within your Radiance. Each orb will slowly follow its target until it connects dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 light damage to anything else it contacts along the way. When the target is reached the orb will explode dealing 100, 135, 163, 186, 207 light damage and healing you for 50% of the damage dealt. This powerful ability will dim your Radiance, reducing its radius to 1 for 5 turns.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Shadow Blast

value2.info_text:

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Shadow Blast

value.info_text:
A surge of twilight pulses from you, doing 39, 70, 93, 113, 130 light and 39, 70, 93, 113, 130 darkness damage to all others within radius 5.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Twilight Surge

value2.info_text:
A surge of twilight pulses from you, doing 39, 70, 93, 113, 130 light and 39, 70, 93, 113, 130 darkness damage to all others within radius 2.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Twilight Surge

value.info_text:
Calls the power of the Sun into a searing lance, doing 114, 154, 186, 212, 236 damage to the target and leaving a radius 1 area of searing light on the ground for 4 turns that does 57, 77, 93, 106, 118 light damage to all foes within it.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Searing Light

value2.info_text:
Calls the power of the Sun into a searing lance, doing 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 damage to the target and leaving a spot on the ground for 4 turns that does 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 light damage to anyone within it.

The damage dealt will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Searing Light

value.info_text:
Invokes the Sun to cause a flare within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, blinding your foes for 4 turns and lighting up the area.

All enemies effected will take 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 light damage.

At talent level 3 you gain 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% light, darkness, and fire resistance for 4 turns.

The damage done and resistances will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Sun Flare

value2.info_text:
Invokes the Sun to cause a flare within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5, blinding your foes for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns and lighting up your immediate area (radius 4, 6, 8, 8, 10).

At level 3 it will also do 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 light damage within radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Sun Flare

value.info_text:
Call forth the Sun to summon a fiery beam that pierces to the farthest enemy dealing 41, 53, 62, 69, 76 fire damage to all enemies hit.

This spell will automatically cast again at the start of your next two turns.

You will gain 3.00, 3.84, 4.48, 5.02, 5.50 positive energy each time firebeam or an instant damage proc caused by firebeam deals damage.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Firebeam

value2.info_text:
Call forth the Sun to summon a fiery beam, burning all targets in a line for 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 fire damage.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Firebeam

value.info_text: Release a burst of sunlight beams at 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 random foes in radius 10, dealing 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 damage to all foes hit and increasing your bonus light damage by 28%, 51%, 63%, 70%, 75% of your bonus darkness damage for 4 turns.
value.name: Sunburst

value2.info_text:
Conjures a furious burst of Sunlight, dealing 107, 145, 175, 200, 222 light damage to all around you in a radius of 3.

The damage done will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Sunburst

value.info_text:
You stand between the darkness and the light, allowing you to convert 15 positive energy into 89, 142, 186, 225, 260 negative energy.

The negative energy gain will increase with your Cunning.
value.name: Twilight

value2.info_text:

Harass your stalked victim with two quick attacks for 35% (at 0 Hate) to 67% (at 100+ Hate) damage each. Each attack that scores a hit disrupts one talent, rune or infusion for 2, 2, 3, 3, 4 turns. Your opponent will be unnerved by the attacks, reducing the damage they deal by 45%, 48%, 50%, 52%, 55% for 2 turns.

Damage reduction increases with the Willpower stat.

This talent will also attack with your shield, if you have one equipped.
value.name: Harass Prey

value2.info_text:
Harass your stalked victim with two quick attacks for 35% (at 0 Hate) to 67% (at 100+ Hate) damage each. Each attack that scores a hit disrupts one talent, rune or infusion for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns. Your opponent will be unnerved by the attacks, reducing the damage they deal by 63%, 69%, 72%, 75%, 76% for 2 turns.

Damage reduction increases with the Willpower stat.
value2.name: Harass Prey

value.info_text:
The connection between predator and prey allows you to speak to the mind of your target and beckon them closer. For 7, 10, 10, 10, 10 turns, they will try to come to you, even pushing others aside to do so. They will move towards you instead of acting 27%, 37%, 44%, 50%, 55% of the time, but can save verses Mindpower to slow the effect. If they take significant damage, the beckoning may be overcome altogether. The effect makes concentration difficult for your target, reducing Spellpower and Mindpower by 14, 18, 22, 24, 27 until they reach you.

The Spellpower and Mindpower reduction increases with your Willpower.
value.name: Beckon

value2.info_text:
The connection between predator and prey allows you to speak to the mind of your target and beckon them closer. For 7, 10, 12, 15, 18 turns, they will try to come to you, even pushing others aside to do so. They will move towards you instead of acting 27%, 37%, 44%, 50%, 55% of the time, but can save verses Mindpower to slow the effect. If they take significant damage, the beckoning may be overcome altogether. The effect makes concentration difficult for your target, reducing Spellpower and Mindpower by 14, 18, 22, 24, 27 until they reach you.

The Spellpower and Mindpower reduction increases with your Willpower.
value2.name: Beckon

value.info_text:
Let hate fuel your movements. While active, you gain 60%, 79%, 94%, 106%, 116% movement speed. The recklessness of your movement brings you bad luck (Luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

Sustaining Surge while Dual Wielding grants 17, 22, 26, 29, 32 additional Defense.

Movement speed and dual-wielding Defense both increase with the Willpower stat.
value.name: Surge

value2.info_text:
Let hate fuel your movements. While active, you gain 60%, 79%, 94%, 106%, 116% movement speed. The recklessness of your movement brings you bad luck (Luck -3).

Cleave, Repel and Surge cannot be active simultaneously, and activating one will place the others in cooldown.

The speed of your movements, combined with the balance and utility of two weapons, gives you 17, 22, 26, 29, 32 extra Defense while dual-wielding.

Movement speed and dual-wielding Defense both increase with the Willpower stat.
value2.name: Surge

value.info_text:
Instill fear in your foes within 2 radius of a target location dealing 24, 33, 40, 45, 50 mind and 24, 33, 40, 45, 50 darkness damage and causing one of 4 possible fears that last for 8 turns.

The targets can save vs your Mindpower to resist the effect.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.

Possible fears are:

Paranoid: Gives the target an 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 50% chance to physically attack a nearby creature, friend or foe. If hit, their target will be afflicted with Paranoia as well.

Despair: Reduces mind resist, mindsave, armour and defence by 25, 34, 41, 47, 52.

Terrified: Deals 6.00, 8.00, 10, 11, 13 mind and 6.00, 8.00, 10, 11, 13 darkness damage per turn and increases cooldowns by 38%, 52%, 62%, 71%, 79%.

Haunted: Causes the target to suffer 9.39, 13, 15, 18, 19 mind and 9.39, 13, 15, 18, 19 darkness damage for each detrimental mental effect every turn.
value.name: Instill Fear

value2.info_text:
Instill fear in your target, causing one of several possible fears that lasts for 8 turns. There is also a 25% chance of instilling fear in any foe in a radius of 2. The target can save versus Mindpower to resist the effect, and can be affected by multiple fears.

You gain 2 new fears: The Paranoid effect gives the target an 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 60% chance to physically attack a nearby creature, friend or foe. If hit, their target will be afflicted with Paranoia as well. The Despair effect reduces the target's resistance to all damage by 25%, 34%, 41%, 47%, 52%.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Instill Fear

value.info_text:
Heighten the fears of those near to you. Any foe you attempt to inflict a fear upon and who remains in a radius of 8 and in sight of you for 4 (non-consecutive) turns, will take 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 mind and 16, 22, 26, 30, 33 darkness damage and gain a new fear that lasts for 8 turns.

This effect completely ignores fear resistance, but can be saved against.
value.name: Heighten Fear

value2.info_text:
Heighten the fears of everyone around you. Any foe you inflict at least one fear upon and who remains in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 and in sight of you for 5 (non-consecutive) turns, will gain a new fear that lasts for 8 turns. The target can save versus Mindpower to resist the effect, and each added fear reduces the chances of another by 10%.

You gain 2 new fears: The Terrified effect causes talents and attacks to fail 28%, 38%, 46%, 50%, 50% of the time. The Distressed effect reduces all saves by 18, 25, 30, 35, 38.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Heighten Fear

value.info_text:
Impose your tyranny on the minds of those who fear you. When a foe gains a new fear, you have a 27%, 41%, 47%, 50%, 52% chance to increase the duration of their heightened fear and one random existing fear effect by 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns, to a maximum of 8 turns.

Additionally, you gain 2 Mindpower and Physical power for 5 turns every time you apply a fear, stacking up to 8, 13, 17, 20, 23 times.
value.name: Tyrant

value2.info_text:
Impose your tyranny on the minds of those who fear you. Your mindpower is increased by 7, 11, 13, 15, 17 against foes who attempt to resist your fears.

You gain 2 new fears: The Haunted effect causes each existing or new fear effect that the target suffers from to inflict 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 mind damage. The Tormented effect causes 5, 5, 6, 6, 7 apparitions to manifest and attack the target, inflicting 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 mind damage each before disappearing.

Fear effects improve with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Tyrant

value.info_text: Panic your enemies within a range of 4 for 5, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns. Anyone who fails to make a mental save against your Mindpower has a 26%, 32%, 36%, 40%, 43% chance each turn of trying to run away from you.
value.name: Panic

value2.info_text: Panic your enemies within a range of 4 for 5, 6, 7, 8, 8 turns. Anyone who fails to make a mental save against your Mindpower has a 33%, 43%, 51%, 58%, 60% chance each turn of trying to run away from you.
value2.name: Panic

value.info_text:
Your fury becomes an unseen force that randomly lashes out at foes around you. For 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns you strike 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 (39%, 86%, 23%, 54%, 81% chance for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3) nearby target(s) within range 5 doing 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 damage and 2 knockback. The number of extra strikes increases at higher talent levels.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value.name: Unseen Force

value2.info_text:
Your fury becomes an unseen force that randomly lashes out at foes around you. For 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns you strike 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 (39%, 86%, 23%, 54%, 81% chance for 2, 2, 3, 3, 3) nearby target(s) within range 5 doing 93, 126, 151, 173, 193 damage and 2 knockback. The number of extra strikes increases at higher talent levels.

In addition, your ability to channel force with this talent increases all critical damage by 5%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% (currently: 0%)

Damage increases with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Unseen Force

value.info_text:
Use a gesture of pain in place of a normal attack to assault the minds of your enemies, inflicting between 43, 59, 70, 80, 89 and 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 mind damage. If the attack succeeds, there is a 12%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% chance to stun your opponent for 3 turns.

This strike replaces your melee physical and checks your Mindpower against your opponent's Mental Save, and is thus not affected by your Accuracy or the enemy's Defense. The base damage (doubled) and the critical chance of any Mindstars equipped are added in when this attack is performed.

This talent requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands and has a 25% chance to inflict brainlock, which can critically hit. The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

If attacking with two mindstars the attack will trigger their proc effects, if any.

Mindstars bonuses from damage and physical criticals: (+0 damage, +0 critical chance)
value.name: Gesture of Pain

value2.info_text:
Use a gesture of pain in place of a normal attack to assault the minds of your enemies, inflicting between 43, 59, 70, 80, 89 and 86, 117, 141, 161, 179 mind damage. If the attack succeeds, there is a 12%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 22% chance to stun your opponent for 3 turns.

This strike replaces your melee physical and checks your Mindpower against your opponent's Mental Save, and is thus not affected by your Accuracy or the enemy's Defense. The base damage (doubled) and the critical chance of any Mindstars equipped are added in when this attack is performed.

This talent requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands and has a 25% chance to inflict cross tier effects which can be critical hits. The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

If attacking with two mindstars the attack will trigger their proc effects, if any.

Mindstars bonuses from damage and physical criticals: (+0 damage, +0 critical chance)
value2.name: Gesture of Pain

value.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 17, 24, 29, 33, 36 damage (23%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 50% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.3 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning). Deflected attacks cannot be crits.

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
value.name: Gesture of Guarding

value2.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 10, 15, 18, 20, 22 damage (23%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 50% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.3 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning). Deflected attacks cannot be crits.

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
value2.name: Gesture of Guarding

value.info_text:
A terrible gloom surrounds you, affecting all those who approach to within radius 3. At the end of each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have a 7%, 10%, 12%, 13%, 15% chance to suffer from slowness (30%), stun or confusion (30%) for 3 turns.

The chance increases with your mind speed.

This ability is innate, and carries no cost to activate or deactivate.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value.name: Gloom

value2.info_text:
A terrible gloom surrounds you, affecting all those who approach to within radius 3. Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have an 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance to suffer from slowness, stun or confusion for 3 turns.

This ability is innate, and carries no cost to activate or deactivate. Each point in Gloom increases the mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
value2.name: Gloom

value.info_text:
Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower or have an 4.0%, 5.7%, 7.0%, 8.0%, 8.9% chance of becoming dismayed for 3 turns. When dismayed, the first melee attack against the foe will result in a critical hit.

Each point in Dismay increases the Mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
value.name: Dismay

value.info_text:
Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have a 7%, 10%, 12%, 13%, 15% chance to be crippled by fear for 3 turns, reducing damage they inflict by -14%, -20%, -24%, -27%, -29%. The first time you melee strike a foe after they have been weakened will give you 2 hate.

The chance increases with your mind speed.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value.name: Weakness

value2.info_text:
Each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have an 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17% chance to be crippled by fear for 3 turns, reducing damage they inflict by -14%, -20%, -24%, -27%, -29%. The first time you melee strike a foe after they have been weakened will give you 2 hate.

Each point in Weakness increases the Mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
value2.name: Weakness

value.info_text:
Every time you act, all enemies in your gloom take 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 mind damage and 11, 15, 18, 21, 23 darkness damage.

The damage scales with your Mindpower.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value.name: Mindrot

value.info_text:
Your gloom has become a sanctuary from the outside world. Damage from any attack that originates beyond the boundary of your gloom is reduced by 12%, 17%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value.name: Sanctuary

value2.info_text:
Your gloom has become a sanctuary from the outside world. Damage from any attack that originates beyond the boundary of your gloom is reduced by 12%, 17%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Each point in Sanctuary increases the Mindpower of all gloom effects (current: +1, +3, +4, +6, +7).
value2.name: Sanctuary

value.info_text:
You are linked to your shadows for 3, 6, 8, 10, 11 turns, diverting 30%, 39%, 46%, 52%, 58% of all damage you take to a random shadow.

Effect increases with Mindpower.
value.name: Shadow Empathy

value.info_text:
You are linked to your shadows for 3, 6, 8, 10, 11 turns, diverting 30%, 39%, 46%, 52%, 58% of all damage you take to a random shadow.

Effect increases with Mindpower.
value.name: Shadow Empathy

value.info_text:
You empathy with your shadows causes the line between you and your shadows to blur.

You lose -15% light resistance, but gain 11%, 17%, 21%, 25%, 28% darkness resistance and affinity. You also gain 2.23%, 2.99%, 3.58%, 4.07%, 4.51% all resistance for each shadow in your party.
value.name: Shadows Empathy

value.info_text:
Your shadows guard you with their lives.

When you would receive a fatal blow, you instantly transpose with a random shadow that takes the blow instead, putting this talent on cooldown.

For the next 4 turns you only die if you reach -507, -683, -820, -936, -1039 life.

Effect increases with Mindpower.
value.name: Shadow Decoy

value2.info_text:
Your shadows guard you with their lives.

When you would receive a fatal blow, you instantly transpose with a random shadow that takes the blow instead, putting this talent on cooldown.

For the next 4 turns you only die if you reach -215, -289, -345, -393, -436 life.

Effect increases with Mindpower.
value2.name: Shadow Decoy

value.info_text: Improve your predation by learning from past hunts. You gain 0.30, 0.69, 0.98, 1.24, 1.46 accuracy and 0.15, 0.34, 0.49, 0.62, 0.73 armor penetration against foes for each foe of that type you have previously slain, to a maximum of 14, 34, 49, 61, 72 accuracy and 7, 17, 24, 30, 36 apr.
value.name: Predator

value.info_text:
Upon making a critical melee attack the savagery of your predation causes a Cursed Miasma to begin permeating your hunting grounds.

The miasma will seep from 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 locations, including your own, within radius 4, deals 39, 52, 63, 72, 80 damage split between Darkness and Mind and blocks sight.

Prey lost within your miasma have a 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17% chance to lose track of you and may mistake friends for foe.

Savage Hunter costs 8 Hate on trigger and does not trigger when you're in Cursed Miasma.
value.name: Savage Hunter

value.info_text:
While shrouded in cursed miasma you gain stealth (45, 61, 73, 84, 93 power) and 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 physical power.

The stealth power and physical power will increase with your mindpower.
value.name: Shrouded Hunter

value.info_text:
Your knowledge of your prey allows you to strike with extra precision. Attacks against the marked type gain +2, +3, +5, +6, +7 Accuracy, while those against the marked sub-type gain +5, +9, +12, +15, +18 Accuracy. Melee hits also gain a 3.6%, 5.0%, 6.2%, 7.1%, 7.9% chance to stun the marked sub-type for 3 turns with each attack.

Each point in Anatomy reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
value.name: Anatomy

value.info_text:
Each melee hit gives you a chance to outmaneuver your marked prey, lowering their physical resistance by 9%, 13%, 16%, 18%, 20% and reducing their highest statistic by 4, 6, 8, 9, 10. Subject to your effectiveness against the marked prey, there is a 4.6%, 6.5%, 8.0%, 9.1%, 10% chance to outmaneuver your marked type and a 12%, 17%, 20%, 23%, 25% maximum chance to outmaneuver your marked sub-type. The effects last for 10 turns, and can accumulate.

Each point in Outmaneuver reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
value.name: Outmaneuver

value.info_text:
You learn to mimic the strengths of your prey. Killing a marked sub-type raises your stats to match the strengths of the victim (up to a maximum of 8, 13, 18, 22, 26 total points, subject to your current effectiveness). The effect lasts indefinitely, but only the effects of the latest kill will be applied.

Each point in Mimic reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
value.name: Mimic

value.info_text: Focus your predation on the most worthy prey. Upon entering a level for the first time, up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 4 foes are marked as your prey. You gain vision of them, wherever they are. Additionally, all damage you receive from their subtype is reduced by 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%, 17%.
value.name: Mark Prey

value2.info_text:
Mark a single opponent as your prey, gaining bonuses against the targeted creature's type and sub-type. Bonuses scale with the experience you gain from killing your marked type (+0.25 kill experience) and marked sub-type (+1 kill experience). At 20, 19, 18, 17, 16 kill experience, you reach 100% effectiveness. Combat attacks against the marked type gain +7%, +10%, +12%, +14%, +16% damage, while those against the marked sub-type gain +17%, +24%, +29%, +34%, +38% damage.

Each point in Mark Prey reduces the kill experience required to reach 100% effectivess as a Predator.
value2.name: Mark Prey

value.info_text:
You unleash your hateful mind on any who dare approach you, inflicing 220, 298, 359, 410, 456 mind damage. The attack will hit multiple targets, but each additional target will further reduce damage by 23%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13%.

25% chance to brainlock. The damage increases with your Mindpower.

25% chance of brainlock. The damage will increase with your Mindpower.

You enter a terrible rampage for 5 turns (up to a maximum of 8 turns), destroying everything in your path. Starting a rampage is instantaneous. You may also enter a rampage (50% chance) when you are hit for more than 8% of your max life.

Any talent, rune or infusion you use while rampaging becomes a distraction, and reduces the duration of the rampage by 1. Your first movement while rampaging increases the rampage duration by 1.

You can only have two of these shields active at once.

Each stack reduces their physical save by 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, defense and armour by 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.

This effect may only occur once per turn.

Energy will then discharge from your weapon, doing an extra 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage and halving their stun/daze/freeze/pin resistance for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

If the target is pinned and Charged Shield is sustained, its absorb value will be increased by 203, 275, 330, 378, 420.

If the target is frozen, the ice will melt in a flash of vapour, knocking back all creatures around it in radius 2.

The discharge damage will scale with your Mindpower.

In addition:

The cooldowns of Charged Shield, Charged Leech, Charged Aura, Charged Strike and Brainstorm are reset.

Your Charged Shield will have 100% absorption efficiency and will absorb twice the normal amount of damage.

Brainstorm will also inflict blindness.

Charge Leech will also inflict confusion (18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% effect).

value.info_text:
You move through the dream world, reappearing at a nearby location.

If there is a sleeping creature at the target location, you'll appear as close to them as possible, otherwise, you'll appear within 6, 5, 4, 2, 1 tiles of your intended destination.
value.name: Dream Walk

value2.info_text: You move through the dream world, reappearing near the target location (6, 5, 4, 2, 1 teleport accuracy). If the target is a sleeping creature, you'll instead appear as close to them as possible.
value2.name: Dream Walk

value.info_text:
Imprisons all sleeping targets within range in their dream state, effectively extending sleeping effects for as long as Dream Prison is maintainted.

This powerful effect constantly drains 4.56%, 3.40%, 2.81%, 2.45%, 2.22% of your maximum Psi (excluding this talent) per turn, and is considered a psionic channel; as such it will break if you move.

(Note that sleeping effects that happen each turn, such as Nightmare's damage and Sleep's contagion, will cease to function for the duration of the effect.)
value.name: Dream Prison

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and hone a weapon, set of body armor, or a shield. (Mindstars resist being adjusted because they are already in an ideal natural state.)

The accuracy and damage of any weapon will act as if 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 higher.

Your total armour will increase by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 and your fatigue rating by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12 for each body armour and shield worn.

The effects increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Reshape Weapon/Armour

value.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and synergize equipment you wear to your form and function.

Any weapon you wield will gain a boost of 15, 21, 25, 28, 32 to both accuracy and power. (The power is treated like an increase to your stats. Mindstars cannot be manipulated in this way because they are already in an ideal natural state.)

Your total armour will increase by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 and your fatigue will decrease by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12 for each body armour and shield worn.

The effects increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Form and Function

value.info_text:
Matter is energy, as any good Mindslayer knows. Unfortunately, the various bonds and particles involved are just too numerous and complex to make the conversion feasible in most cases. The ordered, crystalline structure of a gem, however, make it possible to transform a small percentage of its matter into usable energy.

This talent consumes one gem and grants 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 psi per turn for between 5 and 13 turns, depending on the quality of the gem used.

This process also creates a resonance field that provides the (imbued) effects of the gem to you while this effect lasts.
value.name: Matter is Energy

value.info_text:
Build telekinetic power and dump it into an adjacent creature or yourself.

This will launch them to a targeted location in radius 6, 8, 8, 9, 9.

Launched enemies take 121, 164, 197, 225, 250 Physical damage and are stunned for 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 turns upon landing.

When the target lands, creatures within radius 2 take 61, 82, 99, 113, 125 Physical damage and are knocked away from you.

This talent ignores 26%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of the knockback resistance of the thrown target, which takes half damage if it resists being thrown.

When used on yourself, you will launch in a straight line, knocking enemies flying and doing 121, 164, 197, 225, 250 Physical damage to each.

You can break through 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 walls while doing this.

The damage and range increases with Mindpower.

This will launch them to where ever you target in a radius of 6, 8, 8, 9, 9.

Upon landing, launched enemy takes 121, 164, 197, 225, 250 Physical damage and is stunned for 3, 4, 4, 4, 4 turns.

All other creatures within radius 2 of the landing point take 61, 82, 99, 113, 125 Physical damage and are knocked away from you.

This talent ignores 26%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of the knockback resistance of the thrown target, which takes half damage if it resists being thrown.

value.info_text:
Brings the target's inner demons to the surface. Each turn, for 4, 9, 11, 12, 12 turns, there's a 19%, 24%, 27%, 30%, 32% chance that a demon will surface, requiring the target to make a Mental Save to keep it from manifesting.

If the target is sleeping, the chance to save will be halved, and fear immunity will be ignored. Otherwise, if the summoning is resisted, the effect will end early.

The summon chance will scale with your Mindpower and the demon's life will scale with the target's rank.

If a demon manifests the sheer terror will remove all sleep effects from the victim, but not the Inner Demons.

value.info_text:
Allows you to wield a physical melee or ranged weapon, a mindstar or a gem telekinetically, gaining a special effect for each.

A gem will provide a +3 bonus to all primary stats per tier of the gem.

A mindstar will randomly try to telekinetically grab a far away foe (10% chance and range 3 for a tier 1 mindstar, +1 range and +5% chance for each tier above 1) and pull it into melee range.

A physical melee weapon will act as a semi independant entity, automatically attacking adjacent foes each turn, while a ranged weapon will fire at your target whenever you perform a ranged attack.

While this talent is active, all melee and ranged attacks use 60% of your Cunning and Willpower in place of Dexterity and Strength for accuracy and damage calculations respectively.
value.name: Beyond the Flesh

value2.info_text:

value.info_text:
You call upon one of your reserve bodies, assuming its form.

A body used this way may not be healed in any way.

You can choose to exit the body at any moment by using this talent again, returning it to your reserve as it is.

When you reach 0 life you are forced out of it and the shock deals -136% of the maximum life of your normal body to you while reducing your movement speed by 50% and your damage by 60% for 6 turns.

The cooldown only starts when you resume your normal form.

While in another body all experience you gain still goes to you but will not be applied until you revert back.

While in another body your currently equiped objects are merged in you, you can not take them of or wear new ones.

Bodies possessed:

none

You can choose to exit the body at any moment by using this talent again, returning it to your reserve as it is, including any physical effects. Mental, magical and "other" effects are bound to you and will remain in effect on you.

When you reach 0 life you are forced out of it and the shock deals -136% of the maximum life of your normal body to you while reducing your movement speed by 50% and your damage by 60% for 6 turns.

The cooldown only starts when you resume your normal form.

While in another body all experience you gain still goes to you but will not be applied until you revert back.

While in another body your currently equiped objects are merged in you, you can not take them of or wear new ones.

none

value.info_text:
When you assume the form of an other body you gain more control over the body:

  • at level 1 you gain one more talent slot
  • at level 2 you gain one more talent slot
  • at level 3 you gain resistances and flat resistances
  • at level 4 you gain one more talent slot
  • at level 5 you gain all speeds (only if they are superior to yours)
  • at level 6+ you gain one more talent slot

Fills the air around you with reactive currents of force.

If you have a gem or mindstar in your psionically wielded slot, this will do 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Physical damage to all adjacent enemies, costing 0.5 energy per creature.

If you have a conventional weapon in your psionically wielded slot, this will add 25, 34, 41, 47, 53 Physical damage to all your weapon hits, costing 0.5 energy per hit.

When deactivated, if you have at least 6 energy, a massive spike of kinetic energy is released as a range 6 beam, smashing targets for up to 202, 274, 330, 377, 419 physical damage and sending them flying.

Activating the aura takes no time but de-activating it does.

To turn off an aura without spiking it, deactivate it and target yourself. The damage will improve with your Mindpower.

You can only have two of these auras active at once.

value.info_text:

Your global speed is increased by 5.0%, 8.9%, 12%, 16%, 18%.

If your life drops below 30% you gain 1.5 turns. This effect can only happen once every 47, 37, 33, 30, 28 turns.
value.name: Quickened

value2.info_text:
Yeeks live fast, think fast, and sacrifice fast for the Way.

Increase global speed by 5.0%, 8.9%, 12%, 16%, 18%.
value2.name: Quickened

value.info_text:
Reach through the collective psionic gestalt of the yeeks, the Way, to call for immediate help.

Summons up to 3 yeek mindslayers to your side for 6 turns.

All their primary stats will be set to 61, 86, 107, 127, 146 (based on your Willpower and Talent Level).

Your increased damage, damage penetration, and many other stats will be inherited.
value.name: Wayist

value2.info_text:
Reach through the collective psionic gestalt of the yeeks, the Way, to call for immediate help.

Summons up to 3 yeek mindslayers to your side for 6 turns.
value2.name: Wayist

value.info_text:
Your yeti is attuned to the cold climates.

For 5 turns all damage you deal has 30%, 35%, 41%, 46%, 50% chance to encase the target in an iceblock for 3 turns.

While Algid Rage is up you easily pierce through iceblocks, reducing the damage they absorb by 50%.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
value.name: Algid Rage

value2.info_text:
Your yeti is attuned to the cold climates.

For 5 turns all damage you deal has 30%, 35%, 41%, 46%, 50% chances to encase the target in an iceblock for 3 turns.

While Algid Rage is up you easily pierce through iceblocks, reducing the damage they absorb by 50%.

The bonus will increase with your Willpower.
value2.name: Algid Rage

value.info_text:
While Acid Infusion is active, your bombs coat your golem in acid for 7, 9, 11, 13, 14 turns when they hit it.

While coated, any melee hit against your golem has a 41%, 54%, 62%, 68%, 72% chance to trigger a radius 4 cone of acid towards the attacker that does 0.0 Acid damage to all caught inside. (This can only happen once per turn.)

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
value.name: Caustic Golem

value2.info_text:
While Acid Infusion is active, your bombs coat your golem in acid for 7, 9, 11, 13, 14 turns when they hit it.

While coated, any melee hit agaist your golem has a 41%, 54%, 62%, 68%, 72% chance to trigger a radius 4 cone of acid towards the attacker that does 0.0 Acid damage to all caught inside. (This can only happen once per turn.)

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
value2.name: Caustic Golem

value.info_text:
Acid erupts all around your target, dealing 220, 299, 359, 411, 456 acid damage.

The acid attack is extremely distracting, and may remove up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 physical or mental temporary effects or mental sustains (depending on the Spell Save of the target).

The damage and chance to remove effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Dissolving Acid

value2.info_text:
Acid errupts all around your target, dealing 220, 299, 359, 411, 456 acid damage.

The acid attack is extremely distracting, and may remove up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 physical or mental temporary effects or mental sustains (depending on the Spell Save of the target).

The damage and chance to remove effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Dissolving Acid

value.info_text:
Release arcane energies into most magical shields currently protecting you.

It will affect at most 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 shield effects.

Damage Shield, Time Shield, Displacement Shield: Increase the damage absorption value by 75%, 87%, 97%, 105%, 112%.

Disruption Shield: Tap into the stored energies to restore the shield (at a rate of 2 energy per 1 shield power). Any leftover energy is converted back into mana at a rate of 2.21, 1.84, 1.63, 1.49, 1.38 energy per mana.

The charging will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Aegis

value2.info_text:
Release arcane energies into any magical shield currently protecting you, further charging it by 75%, 87%, 97%, 105%, 112% of its max absorb value.

It will affect at most 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 shield effects.

Affected shields are: Damage Shield, Time Shield, Displacement Shield, and Disruption Shield.

The charging will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Aegis

value.info_text:
You focus the aether into a spinning beam of arcane energies, doing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 arcane damage and having 25% chance to silence the creatures it pierces.

The beam will also damage its epicenter each turn for 10% of the damage (but it will not silence).

The beam spins with incredible speed (1600%) and can only hit the same target up to 3 times inbetween their turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Aether Beam

value2.info_text:
You focus the aether into a spinning beam of arcane energies, doing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 arcane damage and having 25% chance to silence the creatures it pierces.

The beam will also damage its epicenter each turn for 10% of the damage (but it will not silence).

The beam spins with incredible speed (1600%).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Aether Beam

value.info_text:
Infuse your body with untethered aether forces for 5, 7, 8, 9, 9 turns.

While active, the cooldown for Arcane and Aether spells is divided by 3, your arcane damage and penetration is increased by 25%, your Disruption Shield radius is increased to 10, and your maximum mana is increased by 33%.

Using non arcane based spells in this state is hard and makes you lose 50 mana each time (up to once per turn).

Spells considered arcane for the purpose of not-losing mana are:
value.name: Aether Avatar

value2.info_text:
Fill yourself with aether forces, completely surrounding your body for 5, 7, 8, 9, 9 turns.

While active, you can only cast arcane or aether spells, your cooldown for them is divided by 3, your arcane damage is increased by 25%, your Disruption Shield can be used at any time, and your maximum mana is increased by 33%.
value2.name: Aether Avatar

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with Pure Aether, increasing all your arcane damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12% and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% arcane resistance of your targets.

At level 5 casting Aether Avatar removes up to 1, 2, 3, 4, 4 magical or physical detrimental effects.
value.name: Pure Aether

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with Pure Aether, increasing all your arcane damage by 3.4%, 6.2%, 8.4%, 10%, 12% and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% arcane resistance of your targets.

At level 5 it allows Aegis spells to be used while in Aether Avatar form.
value2.name: Pure Aether

value.info_text:
Conjures up mana into a powerful beam of lightning, doing 81, 109, 131, 150, 167 to 242, 328, 394, 451, 501 damage (161, 218, 263, 300, 334 average)

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Lightning

value2.info_text:
Conjures up mana into a powerful beam of lightning, doing 81, 109, 131, 150, 167 to 242, 328, 394, 451, 501 damage

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Lightning

value.info_text:
Invokes a forking beam of lightning doing 76, 103, 124, 141, 157 to 227, 308, 371, 424, 471 damage (152, 205, 247, 283, 314 average) and forking to another target.

It can hit up to 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Chain Lightning

value2.info_text:
Invokes a forking beam of lightning doing 57, 77, 93, 106, 118 to 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 damage and forking to another target.

It can hit up to 4, 6, 7, 8, 8 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Chain Lightning

value.info_text:
Conjures a furious, raging lightning storm with a radius of 6 that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a random lightning bolt will hit up to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 of your foes for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage (26, 35, 42, 49, 54 average) in a radius of 1.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Thunderstorm

value2.info_text:
Conjures a furious, raging lightning storm with a radius of 6 that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a random lightning bolt will hit up to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 of your foes for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage in a radius of 1.

This powerful spell will drain 1.50, 3.00, 4.50, 6.00, 7.50 mana with each hit.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Thunderstorm

value.info_text:
Crush and consume two souls to empower your next 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 spells, granting them a special effect.

Affected spells are:

  • Undeath Link: in addition to the heal a shield is created for half the heal power
  • Create Minions: allows you to summon 2 more minions
  • Assemble: allows you to summon a second bone golem
  • Invoke Darkness: becomes a cone of darkness
  • Shadow Tunnel: teleported minions will also be healed for 30% of their max life
  • Cold Flames: freeze chance increased to 100%
  • Freeze: becomes a ball of radius 2 and makes all targets wet
  • Consume Soul: effect increased by 50%
value.name: Essence of the Dead

value2.info_text:
Crush and consume two souls to empower your next 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 spells, granting them a special effect.

Affected spells are:

  • Undeath Link: in addition to the heal a shield is created for half the heal power
  • Create Minions: allows you to summon 2 more minions
  • Assemble: allows you to summon a second bone golem
  • Invoke Darkness: becomes a cone of darkness
  • Shadow Tunnel: teleported minions will also be healed for 30% of their max life
  • Cold Flames: freeze chance increased to 100%
  • Ice Shards: each shard becomes a beam
  • Consume Soul: effect increased by 50%
value2.name: Essence of the Dead

value.info_text:
Creates a vortex of arcane energies on the target for 6 turns. Each turn the vortex will look for another foe in sight and fire a manathrust doing 39, 53, 64, 73, 81 arcane damage to all foes in line.

If no foes are found, the target will take 50% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Arcane Vortex

value2.info_text:
Creates a vortex of arcane energies on the target for 6 turns. Each turn the vortex will look for another foe in sight and fire a manathrust doing 39, 53, 64, 73, 81 arcane damage to all foes in line.

If no foes are found, the target will take 50% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Arcane Vortex

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with arcane forces, disrupting any attempts to harm you by creating a shield of pure aether which can absorb 313, 425, 511, 585, 650 damage.

In combat, the mental focus required to maintain and monitor the shield is too much and you let it run on its own. In this state once the shield power is depleted it will start using your mana to absorb hits, at a ratio of 0.91, 0.58, 0.45, 0.39, 0.35 mana per damage.

Whenever mana is used by the shield it stores a remnant of this energy (up to 200 max). When the shield is deactivated any stored energy is released in a radius 5 arcane storm that lasts 5 turns, dealing 20% of the total stored damage each turn.

Outside of combat the shield regenerates 10% of its power each turn and stored energy quickly dissipates.

Dropping below 50% mana or reaching max energy storage will automatically deactivate this talent.

The shield power improves with your Spellpower.

The maximum energy storage is based on your total mana (ignoring sustained spells).

Current shield power: 0

Current stored energy: 0
value.name: Disruption Shield

value2.info_text:
Surround yourself with arcane forces, disrupting any attempts to harm you and instead generating mana.

Generates 1.65, 1.17, 0.80, 0.50, 0.50 mana per damage point taken (Aegis Shielding talent affects the ratio).

If your mana is brought too high by the shield, it will de-activate and the chain reaction will release a deadly arcane storm around you with radius 3 for 10 turns, dealing 10% of the damage absorbed over the sustain's duration each turn, up to a maximum of 200 total damage.

While the arcane storm rages, you also get 85%, 97%, 107%, 115%, 122% arcane resistance.

Only usable when below 25% mana.

The damage to mana ratio increases with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Disruption Shield

value.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 13, 15, 16, 18, 18 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 5, 3, 2, 1, 1).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Phase Door

value2.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 13, 15, 16, 18, 18 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 5, 3, 2, 1, 1).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Phase Door

value.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a large range (110, 125, 150, 175, 200).

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 19, 18, 16, 15, 14).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

Random teleports have a minimum range of 15.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Teleport

value2.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a large range (110, 125, 150, 175, 200).

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 19, 18, 16, 15, 14).

value2.name: Teleport

value.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shaterring force, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 range.

The beam continues to a range of 10, affecting any creatures in its path, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage to them.

If any walls are dug, you gain 16%, 22%, 26%, 30%, 33% physical damage bonus for 6 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Pulverizing Auger

value2.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shaterring force, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5.

The beam also affect any creatures in its path, dealing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 physical damage to all.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Pulverizing Auger

value.info_text:
The caster's skin grows as hard as stone, granting a 14, 19, 23, 26, 29 bonus to Armour.

Each time you are hit in melee, you have a 51%, 79%, 86%, 90%, 92% chance to reduce the cooldown of an Earth or Stone spell by 2 (this effect can only happen once per turn).

The bonus to Armour will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Stone Skin

value2.info_text:
The caster's skin grows as hard as stone, granting a 14, 19, 23, 26, 29 bonus to Armour.

Each time you are hit in melee, you have a 51%, 79%, 86%, 90%, 92% chance to reduce the cooldown of an Earth or Stone spell by 2 (this effect can only happen once per turn).

The bonus to Armour will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Stone Skin

value.info_text:
Conjures a mudslide, dealing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage in a radius of 4, 5, 7, 8, 9. Any creatures caught inside will be knocked back 8 spaces.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Mudslide

value2.info_text:
Conjures a mudslide, dealing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage in a radius of 4, 5, 7, 8, 9. Any creatures caught inside will be knocked back.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Mudslide

value.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 9, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

At level 4, it becomes targetable.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value.name: Stone Wall

value2.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 9, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
