value.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a melee attack, hitting the target with your weapon and shield for 185%, 290%, 391%, 492%, 591% arcane damage.

If either attack hits, the target will be stunned for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns and you automatically Block.

The chance for the attack to stun increases with your Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.

Damage increases with Spellpower.
value.name: Eldritch Blow

value2.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a melee attack, hitting the target with your weapon and shield for 185%, 290%, 391%, 492%, 591% arcane damage.

If either attack hits, the target will be stunned for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The chance for the attack to stun increases with your Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.

Damage increases with Spellpower.
value2.name: Eldritch Blow

value.info_text:
Imbues your shields with arcane power, dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 arcane damage with each melee strike and 18, 24, 29, 33, 37 arcane damage when hit.

Allows counterstrikes after incomplete blocks and the cooldown of Block is reduced by 0, 1, 1, 2, 2 turns.

The damage will increase with Spellpower.
value.name: Eldritch Infusion

value2.info_text:
Imbues your shields with arcane power, dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 arcane damage with each melee strike and 18, 24, 29, 33, 37 arcane damage when hit.

The damage will increase with Spellpower.
value2.name: Eldritch Infusion

value.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a ferocious melee attack, hitting the target three times with your shields doing 110%, 132%, 148%, 161%, 174% Nature damage.

If any of the attacks hit, the target will be dazed for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns and your Block cooldown is reset.

The chance for the attack to daze increases with you Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.
value.name: Eldritch Fury

value2.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a ferocious melee attack, hitting the target three times with your shields doing 110%, 132%, 148%, 161%, 174% Nature damage.

If any of the attacks hit, the target will be dazed for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The chance for the attack to daze increases with you Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.
value2.name: Eldritch Fury

value.info_text:
Slam your shield on the ground creating a shockwave.

You perform a melee attack for 196%, 223%, 244%, 262%, 278% arcane damage against everyone within radius 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.

Any creature hit by the attack will be submitted to a Counterstrike effect for 3 turns, as if you had blocked against them.

At level 5 your Block cooldown is reset.
value.name: Eldritch Slam

value2.info_text:
Slam your shield on the ground creating a shockwave.

You perform a melee attack for 196%, 223%, 244%, 262%, 278% Arcane damage against everyone within radius 2, 3, 5, 6, 7.
value2.name: Eldritch Slam

value.info_text:
Strike twice with your mainhand weapon dealing 80%, 88%, 95%, 100%, 105% Arcane damage.

If either of these attacks hit you gain 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 mana.

The mana gain will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Arcane Strike

value.info_text:
Hardens your skin with the power of earth, reducing physical damage taken by 38%, 52%, 62%, 71%, 79% for 10 turns.

Damage reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Earthen Barrier

value.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of fire, dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 fire damage per melee attack and increasing all fire damage dealt by 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17%.

Each hit will also regenerate 0.43, 0.87, 1.30, 1.73, 2.17 stamina.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fiery Hands

value2.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of fire, dealing 25, 34, 41, 47, 52 fire damage per melee attack and increasing all fire damage dealt by 8%, 11%, 13%, 15%, 17%.

Each hit will also regenerate 0.43, 0.87, 1.30, 1.73, 2.17 stamina.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Fiery Hands

value.info_text:
You concentrate on your inner self, increasing your Strength, Dexterity, Magic, and Cunning by 11, 14, 18, 20, 22.

Additionally, you gain a shield absorbing 170, 230, 277, 317, 352 damage before you take damage every 10 turns.

The stat increase and shield will improve with your Spellpower.
value.name: Inner Power

value2.info_text:
You concentrate on your inner self, increasing all your stats by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12.

The stat increase will improve with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Inner Power

value.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire that moves toward the target and explodes into a flash of fire, doing 227, 308, 371, 424, 471 fire damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Fireflash

value2.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire that moves toward the target and explodes into a flash of fire, doing 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 fire damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Fireflash

value.info_text:
Turn your body into pure flame, increasing your fire resistance by 28%, 38%, 46%, 53%, 59%, burning any creatures striking you in melee for 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 fire damage, and randomly launching up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 slow-moving fire bolt(s) per turn at targets in sight, each dealing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 fire damage.

The projectiles safely go through your friends without harming them.

The damage and resistance will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Body of Fire

value2.info_text:
Turn your body into pure flame, increasing your fire resistance by 28%, 38%, 46%, 53%, 59%, burning any creatures attacking you for 16, 21, 25, 29, 32 fire damage, and projecting 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 random slow-moving fire bolts per turn at targets in sight, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 fire damage with each bolt.

The projectiles safely go through your friends without harming them.

This powerful spell drains 0.10, 0.20, 0.30, 0.40, 0.50 mana while active.

The damage and resistance will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Body of Fire

value.info_text:
Turn your body into pure ice, increasing your Cold damage affinity by 6%, 12%, 16%, 20%, 23% and your physical resistance by 17%, 23%, 28%, 32%, 35%.

You have a 14%, 29%, 41%, 51%, 60% chance to shrug off all direct critical hits (physical, mental, spell).

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ice Core

value2.info_text:
Turn your body into pure ice, increasing your Cold damage affinity by 6%, 12%, 16%, 20%, 23% and your physical resistance by 28%, 38%, 46%, 53%, 59%.

All direct critical hits (physical, mental, spells) against you have a 14%, 29%, 41%, 51%, 60% lower Critical multiplier (but always do at least normal damage).

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Ice Core

value.info_text:
You summon a galvanic rod at a location. Upon arrival the rod releases a shock in radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 dealing 185, 250, 301, 344, 382 galvanic damage (fire and lightning) to all creatures.

You have 3 rods each with their own 9 turns cooldown.

This spell works with Burning Wake.

This spell has 25% chance to try to activate Hurricane, if used.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Galvanic Rod

value.info_text:
Using your arcane power you force galvanic rods to linger for 25 turns. While lingering they are inert, but can link up to other rods.

When two rods are present in range 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 of one another they link with a galvanic beam.

When three rods are present in range 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 of one another they link with a triangular galvanic zone.

Any creature caught in a galvanic beam or zone take 35, 48, 58, 66, 73 galvanic damage per turn.

You can maintain at most 3 rods.

At level 3 all affected creatures are shocked, reducing their stun and pin resistances by half.

At level 5 your weapon (if metallic, or embedded with a metallic tinker) acts as a rod that does not count towards your maximum.

This spell has 15% chance to try to activate Hurricane, if used.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Galvanic Arcing

value.info_text:
Reaching through the aether you temporarily destabilize a galvanic rod's control systems. (Using your weapon as a rod does not count as a valid target)

This creates a blast in radius 1 around it, or through all connected rods if they are linked dealing 213, 289, 347, 397, 441 galvanic damage to all creatures and stunning them for 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns.

This spell works with Burning Wake.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Unstable Blast

value.info_text:
Using large amounts of arcane power you create a supercharged Unstable Blast in your rods.

The extra energy is briefly converted to a huge mass, pulling in all creatures (but you) in range 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 of any rod towards the center of the galvanic field.

Can only be used with a triangular field is setup.
value.name: Energy Mass Conversion

value.info_text:
Hurl ice shards at the targets in the selected area. Each shard travels slowly and does 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 ice damage, hitting all adjacent targets on impact.

This spell will never hit the caster.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the ice freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ice Shards

value.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, freezing it for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and damaging it for 161, 246, 329, 414, 501.

If this is used on a friendly target the cooldown is reduced by 33%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Freeze

value.info_text:
Removes up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 magical effects (good effects from foes, and bad effects from friends) from the target.

At level 3, it can be targeted.
value.name: Disperse Magic

value2.info_text:
Removes up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 magical effects (good effects from foes, and bad effects from friends) from the target.

At level 3, it can be targeted.
value2.name: Disperse Magic

value.info_text:
Your dark power radiates further as you grow stronger. Increases the radius of your necrotic aura by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, and reduces the decay rate of your minions outside the aura by 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%.

At level 3, necrotic minions inside your aura have a 25% chance to refund their soul on death. If a minion turns into a will o' the wisp then the wisp will have that chance instead.
value.name: Aura Mastery

value2.info_text:
Your dark power radiates further as you grow stronger. Increases the radius of your necrotic aura by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, and reduces the decay rate of your minions outside the aura by 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%.

At level 3, necrotic minions inside your aura have a 25% chance to refund their soul on death. If a minion turns into a will o' the wisp then the wisp will have that chance instead.
value2.name: Aura Mastery

value.info_text:
You imbue a steamsaw with arcane and temporal forces, making it spin very fast around your waist (ignoring requirements).

The saw spins so fast it it disturbs spacetime around you, increasing your spellpower by up to 14, 29, 41, 51, 60, your spell critical chance by up to 3, 6, 8, 10, 11 and your mana regen by up to 0.9, 2.2, 3.3, 4.1, 4.9 (depending on steamsaw tier).

Any melee attack against you also triggers an automatic steamsaw attack that cannot miss dealing 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% weapon damage as occult damage (arcane and temporal).

The steamsaw used will provide its bonus as if it was worn, but you can not Block with it.

Increases steamsaws weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and uses Magic instead of Strength to determine their damage.

If using Aether Avatar, all Occult Technomancy spells become usable for its duration and all occult damage becomes pure arcane.

When you first learn this talent you also learn the Steamsaw tinker creation if you didn't already know it.
value.name: Metaphasic Spin

value.info_text:
Spin your saw at incredible speeds for an instant, fully breaking reality in a 3-wide beam in front of you.

Any creatures caught by the beam take 256, 347, 418, 477, 530 occult damage and are untethered from reality, reducing their global speed by 6%, 13%, 19%, 26%, 32% and the speed of any projectiles they fire by 40%, 52%, 62%, 70%, 77% for 4 turns.

At level 3 any projectiles caught in the beam are instantly annihilated.

At level 5 the beam is so strong that all creatures caught inside are knocked back 3 tiles.

The breach is so deep that the beam will always have the maximum possible length it can.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Reality Breach

value.info_text:
You reach out through the aether to all creatures in sight that were slowed by Reality Breach or Congeal Time.

For each target you create a link of arcane infused steam to it that lasts 7, 11, 13, 15, 16 turns.

Any time the target uses a talent one of your cooling down spells is reduced by 1 (prioritizing Technomancy spells).

Each turn the link is up the target and any creature inside the link takes 15, 20, 24, 28, 31 occult damage.

As long as at least one link is up, the cooldown of your Metaphasic Spin spell is set to 6 turns instead of 30.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ethereal Steam

value.info_text:
Using your sheer arcane power you keep breaches in spacetime open for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns.

Each turn you they are open you project an occult clone of your saw along each breach, damaging any creature caught for 78%, 94%, 106%, 116%, 125% occult weapon damage.

The saw cuts both in a physical and arcane way, reducing the duration of a random beneficial effect on each target by 1, 2, 4, 5, 6 each time.

Each target can only be affected once per turn.

This spell is only usable for one turn after casting Reality Breach but any Reality Breach cast during its duration is also recorded inside.
value.name: Metaphasic Echoes

value.info_text: Try to confuse the target's mind for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 (power 25%, 39%, 43%, 45%, 46%) turns.
value.name: Mind Disruption

value2.info_text: Try to confuse the target's mind for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.
value2.name: Mind Disruption

value.info_text:
You reach out with shadowy vines toward your target, pulling it to you and silencing it for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns and dazing it for 2 turns.

The chance to hit improves with your Accuracy.
value.name: Shadow Ambush

value.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 83%, 88%, 92%, 95% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and +100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
value.name: Ambuscade

value.info_text:
For an instant, your weapons turn into a shadow leash that tries to grab the target's weapon, disarming it for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The chance to hit improves with your Accuracy.
value.name: Shadow Leash

value.info_text:
Creates a circle of radius 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 at your feet; the circle lights up affected tiles, increases your positive energy by 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 each turn and deals 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 light damage and 9.13, 12, 15, 17, 19 fire damage per turn to everyone else within its radius. The circle lasts 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Circle of Blazing Light

value.info_text:
A furious ice storm rages around the caster, doing 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 11, 12, 13, 15, 16 turns.

It has a 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ice Storm

value2.info_text:
A furious ice storm rages around the caster ,doing 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 11, 12, 13, 15, 16 turns.

It has a 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Ice Storm

value.info_text:
Strikes the target with a spark of lightning doing 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 to 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 damage (90, 122, 147, 168, 186 average).

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
value.name: Shadow Lightning

value2.info_text:
Strikes the target with a spark of lightning doing 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 to 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 damage.

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
value2.name: Shadow Lightning

value.info_text:
After casting a technomancy spell you store some of its energies that you can then use to overload your arcane dynamo, increasing the steam it generates per 10 mana spent by 4 for 4 turns.

In addition the energies spills outward in radius 3, dealing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 damage (damage type based on the type of technomancy spell used).

This spell is only usable after casting a technomancy spell and until you use any other spell or talent.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Electron Incantation

value.info_text:
The caster is surrounded by a phantasmal shield granting 10% chance to evade weapon attacks. If hit in melee, the shield will deal 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 light damage to the attacker.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Phantasmal Shield

value2.info_text:
The caster is surrounded by a phantasmal shield. If hit in melee, the shield will deal 79, 107, 129, 148, 164 light damage to the attacker.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Phantasmal Shield

value.info_text: Increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and physical power by 30 when using staves.
value.name: Staff Mastery

value2.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using staves.
value2.name: Staff Mastery

value.info_text:
Lightning emanates from you in a circular wave with radius 3, 4, 4, 5, 6, doing 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 to 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage (90, 122, 147, 168, 186 average) and possibly dazing anyone affected (75% chance).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Nova

value2.info_text:
Lightning emanates from you in a circular wave with radius 3, 4, 4, 5, 6, doing 45, 61, 73, 84, 93 to 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage and possibly dazing anyone affected (75% chance).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Nova

value.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of lightning, doing 64, 87, 104, 119, 132 to 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 damage (128, 173, 208, 238, 265 average) and dazing the target for 3 turns.

If the target resists the daze effect it is instead shocked, which halves stun/daze/pin resistance, for 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Shock

value2.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of lightning, doing 64, 87, 104, 119, 132 to 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 lightning damage and dazing the target for 3 turns.

If the target resists the daze effect it is instead shocked, which halves stun/daze/pin resistance, for 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Shock

value.info_text:
Each time one of your lightning spells dazes a target, it has a 36%, 43%, 49%, 56%, 62% chance to creates a chain reaction that summons a mighty Hurricane that lasts for 10 turns around the target with a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3.

Each turn, the afflicted creature and all creatures around it will take 33, 45, 54, 62, 69 to 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 lightning damage (67, 90, 109, 124, 138 average).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Hurricane

value2.info_text:
Each time one of your lightning spells dazes a target, it has a 36%, 43%, 49%, 56%, 62% chance to creates a chain reaction that summons a mighty Hurricane that lasts for 10 turns around the target with a radius of 2, 2, 3, 3, 3.

Each turn, the afflicted creature and all creatures around it will take 33, 45, 54, 62, 69 to 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 lightning damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Hurricane

value.info_text:
This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (363, 475, 561, 635, 700) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage (Aegis Shielding talent affects the percentage).

While under the effect of Time Shield, all newly applied magical, physical and mental effects will have their durations reduced by 42%, 45%, 47%, 50%, 53%.

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Time Shield

value.info_text: Project a bolt of time distortion, decreasing the target's global speed by 10%, 20%, 31%, 41%, 52% and all projectiles it fires by 54%, 72%, 86%, 90%, 90% for 7 turns.
value.name: Congeal Time

value2.info_text: Project a bolt of time distortion, decreasing the target's global speed by 10%, 20%, 31%, 41%, 52% and all projectiles it fires by 54%, 72%, 86%, 90%, 90% for 7 turns.
value2.name: Congeal Time

value.info_text:
This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (313, 425, 511, 585, 650) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage (Aegis Shielding talent affects the percentage).

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Temporal Shield

value.info_text: Increases the caster's global speed by 8%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 26%.
value.name: Essence of Speed

value2.info_text: Increases the caster's global speed by 12%, 25%, 36%, 46%, 56%.
value2.name: Essence of Speed

value.info_text:
You build 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 micro spiderbot(s) from the earthly elements around you. Spiderbots are powered by an arcane cryogenic power unit directly linked to your own power.

Spiderbots will deal 20, 27, 32, 37, 41 terrene damage (physical and cold) each turn to their targets. The deep cold of the attack has 25% chance to freeze the feet of the target, pinning it to the ground for 5 turns.

If a target dies, the spiderbot will jump onto a new target in range 10 around you.

If there are multiple spiderbots on a single target and more free targets are in range they will dispatch on as many as possible.

If there are multiple spiderbots on a single target they attack as one, stacking their damage (with disminishing returns) and trying to freeze once.

You can maintain up to 3, 6, 9, 11, 13 spiderbots at once and each can last up to 9, 12, 14, 16, 17 turns, but spiderbots need to be in sight to be able to act.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

You have currently 0 spiderbot(s) up.
value.name: Micro Spiderbot

value.info_text:
Each time a spiderbot expires it digs around, producing either a Glacial Vapour (39, 52, 63, 72, 80 cold damage and doing 30% more damage to wet targets) or Earthquake (39, 52, 63, 72, 80 physical damage and 25% chances to stun for 2 turns) of radius 1 that last for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.

Those special kinds of Glacial Vapour and Earthquake do not affect the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Cryogenic Digs

value.info_text:
Command a random spiderbot to jump onto your target at ramming speed. The impact destroys the bot (possibly triggering Cryogenic Digs).

This creates a radius 3 explosion dealing 263, 357, 429, 491, 545 terrene damage to all creatures while also freezing them for 3, 5, 6, 6, 6 turns and rendering them wet for 6, 10, 12, 13, 13 turns.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ramming Bot

value.info_text:
You call back up to 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 spiderbots to you to create protective barrier for 12, 16, 20, 23, 26 turns.

Spiderbots have 56, 75, 90, 102, 113 life and they take damage in order, always fully absorbing the blow that destroyed them.

If Cryogenic Digs is active when a spiderbot is destroyed it jumps to the attacker and triggers the dig there.

The cooldown of this spell is affected by Body of Stone.
value.name: Spiderbot Shield

value.info_text:
You breathe a wave of deathly miasma in a cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 185, 240, 282, 316, 346 darkness damage over 4 turns and receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Magic, and the critical chance is based on your Spell crit rate.
value.name: Necrotic Breath

value2.info_text:
You breathe a wave of deathly miasma in a cone of radius 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 185, 240, 282, 316, 346 darkness damage over 4 turns and receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Magic, and the critical chance is based on your Spell crit rate.
value2.name: Necrotic Breath

value.info_text:
Hurl ice shards at the targets in the selected area. Each shard travels slowly and does 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 ice damage, hitting all adjacent targets on impact with 25% chance to freeze them.

If the target resists being frozen, it instead get wet.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the ice freeze chance increases to 50%.

This spell will never hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Ice Shards

value.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, freezing it for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and damaging it for 161, 246, 329, 414, 501.

If this is used on a friendly target the cooldown is halved.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Freeze

value.info_text:
Glacial fumes rise from the ground, doing 45, 61, 74, 85, 94 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 8 turns.

Creatures that are wet will take 30% more damage and have 15% chance to get frozen.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Glacial Vapour

value2.info_text:
Glacial fumes rise from the ground, doing 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Creatures that are wet will take 30% more damage and have 15% chance to get frozen.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Glacial Vapour

value.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing by 1 per turn to a maximum radius of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5, doing 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 cold damage and 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect, which reduces their stun/freeze immunity by half and interacts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Tidal Wave

value2.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing by 1 per turn to a maximum radius of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5, doing 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 cold damage and 29, 40, 48, 55, 61 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect, which reduces their stun/freeze immunity by half and interacts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Tidal Wave

value.info_text:
You absorb latent cold around you, turning into an ice elemental - a shivgoroth - for 6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns.

While transformed, you do not need to breathe, gain access to the Ice Storm talent at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, gain 72%, 95%, 100%, 100%, 100% resistance to cuts and stuns, gain 36%, 47%, 50%, 50%, 50% cold resistance, and all cold damage heals you for 122%, 145%, 150%, 150%, 150% of the damage done.

The power will increase with your Spellpower.

Ice storm:

Effective talent level: 0.0

Use mode: Activated

Mana cost: 25

Range: melee/personal

Cooldown: 20

Travel Speed: instantaneous

Usage Speed: Spell (100% of a turn)

Is: a spell

Description: A furious ice storm rages around the caster, doing 1.31, 2.69, 5.05, 7.45, 9.88 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 5, 6, 7, 8, 10 turns.

It has a 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Shivgoroth Form

value2.info_text:
You absorb latent cold around you, turning into an ice elemental - a shivgoroth - for 6, 7, 8, 10, 11 turns.

While transformed, you do not need to breathe, gain access to the Ice Storm talent at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, gain 72%, 95%, 100%, 100%, 100% resistance to cuts and stuns, gain 36%, 47%, 50%, 50%, 50% cold resistance, and all cold damage heals you for 122%, 145%, 150%, 150%, 150% of the damage done.

The power will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Shivgoroth Form

value.info_text:
When your Burning Wake talent is active, your Inferno and Burning Wake effects have a 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% chance, each turn, to remove a status effect (physical or magical) from the targets.

If the target is hostile, it will remove a beneficial effect.

If the target is friendly, it will remove a detrimental effect (but still burn).
value.name: Cleansing Flames

value2.info_text:
When your Burning Wake talent is active, your Inferno and Burning Wake effects have a 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% chance, each turn, to remove a status effect (physical, magical, curse or hex) from the targets.

If the target is hostile, it will remove a beneficial effect.

If the target is friendly, it will remove a detrimental effect (but still burn).
value2.name: Cleansing Flames

value.info_text:
Fire a charged shot with your tail-mounted steamgun that pierces through your enemies, ignoring armor and dealing 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% weapon damage as lightning.

This takes no time to use.
value.name: Gauss Cannon

value.info_text:
Improved power output increases the speed of your projectiles by 56%, 78%, 92%, 101%, 107%, critical damage by 12%, 22%, 29%, 35%, 41%, and allows you to automatically reload each turn.

In addition, you can instantly activate this talent to gain a sudden burst of speed, moving to a tile in range 3, 5, 6, 7, 7.
value.name: Magnetic Accelerator

value.info_text:
Fires a barrage of charged missiles from your tail-mounted steamgun at a radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 area, dealing 156%, 179%, 197%, 212%, 225% steamgun damage as lightning as well as dazing those within for 2 turns.

The daze chance increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Haywire Missiles

value.info_text:
Enhancements to your targeting systems give all ranged attacks a 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% chance to trigger an immediate shot from your tail-mounted steamgun for 100% damage as lightning.

In addition, your physical and lightning resistance penetration is increased by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.
value.name: Advanced Targeting System

value.info_text:
You equip an automated, shoulder mounted rocket launcher. Each turn it will launch rockets at up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 enemies in weapon range, dealing 40%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 65% steamgun damage as fire.

The rockets will pass harmlessly through allies.
value.name: Rocket Pod

value.info_text:
Augment your rockets with highly flammable materials, causing them to burn targets for 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 fire damage over 3 turns as well as reducing armor by 5, 17, 21, 23, 25. Subsequent shots against burning targets refresh the effect of the duration and inflict 50, 68, 82, 93, 104 additional fire damage.

Targets affected by this burning that fall below 25% life enter a state of panic, giving them a 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46% chance each turn to flee in terror from you.

The fire damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Incendiary Powder

value.info_text:
Lock on to your target with your rocket pod for 5 turns.

While locked on your regular rocket pod attacks are disabled. However, each turn you automatically fire a rocket barrage dealing 89%, 119%, 143%, 162%, 180% increased damage at your target.

Marked targets also lose 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 defense and cannot benefit from concealment or evasion.

The defense loss will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Lock On

value.info_text:
Launch a powerful guided missile that you gain direct control over. The missile lasts for up to 2 turns, has 1000% movement speed, and evades all negative effects.

On taking any damage or when you activate it, the missile will detonate. This creates a devastating explosion in radius 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, dealing 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage to those within, stunning for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and igniting the ground for a further 56, 75, 91, 104, 115 fire damage each turn.

While controlling the missile your attention is fully devoted to the task, preventing you from taking any other action and leaving you vulnerable.

Warning - the explosion will damage you!
value.name: Seeker Warhead

value.info_text:
You rush to the target and strike with your tailsaw, dealing 216%, 248%, 272%, 292%, 311% damage and taunting enemies within radius 1, 1, 2, 3, 3.

You now also use your Dexterity in place of Strength when equipping Steamsaws as well as when calculating weapon damage, and have your Steamsaw damage increased by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30.
value.name: Overrun

value.info_text: Enhancements to your mecharachnid combat skill increases your melee and ranged evasion by 14%, 22%, 27%, 30%, 33%, and causes you to automatically strike adjacent enemies with your tailsaw for 100%, 122%, 138%, 151%, 164% damage each turn.
value.name: Defensive Protocol

value.info_text: You strike the target with your tailsaw for 141%, 166%, 185%, 202%, 216% damage. If this hits, you attempt to clamp them with your pincers for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. This pins, reduces their attack, spell and mind speed by 14%, 26%, 31%, 35%, 37%, and lets you make a free, unavoidable strike with your tailsaw against them each turn for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% damage. This ends if you move more than 1 tile from the target.
value.name: Pincer Strike

value.info_text:
On falling below 0 life, you engage an automated repair mode. While in this mode you cannot act, but can survive below -118, -347, -523, -671, -802 life, heal for 21, 59, 88, 113, 135 life each turn and have all resistances increased by 14%, 27%, 35%, 40%, 44%. This will last until you are destroyed or until you are fully healed.

This effect has a cooldown.
value.name: Automated Repair System

value.info_text: Increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30 when using steamsaws.
value.name: Steamsaw Mastery

value2.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamsaws.
value2.name: Steamsaw Mastery

value.info_text:
You repurpose your steam engine to emit a cloud of toxic, corrosive chemicals around you.

Each time you use a non-instant steamtech talent, you create a radius 3 cloud of miasma for 5 turns. All enemies within the miasma have 38%, 59%, 69%, 75%, 79% reduced healing and 3%, 5%, 6%, 7%, 7% chance to fail talent usage.

Each time miasma is reapplied the failure chance increases, up to 18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% after 5 reapplications.

The first time each turn a target affected by miasma is hit by a melee or ranged attack the miasma seeps into their wounds, dealing an additional 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 acid damage.

Miasma duration does not increase on re-apply.

When a creature survives the miasma it becomes immune to it for 9 turns.
value.name: Miasma Engine

value.info_text: You fire a toxic shell that explodes in radius 2, 2, 3, 3, 4, dealing 165%, 184%, 199%, 211%, 222% weapon damage as acid and leaving behind a cloud of miasma for 3, 4, 5, 6, 6 turns that inherits all effects from your Miasma Engine.
value.name: Caustic Dispersal

value.info_text: You become difficult to target through the thick smog generated by your Miasma Engine. While surrounded by miasma you have a 3%, 6%, 7%, 8%, 8% chance to entirely avoid damage, increased by 1%, 2%, 2%, 2%, 3% per increased radius stack.
value.name: Smogscreen

value.info_text:
You consume all Miasma Engine stacks you have to fire a blast of corrosive death through your steamgun, dealing 140%, 157%, 170%, 181%, 191% weapon damage as acid in a radius 1 cone with a 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% chance to remove a random beneficial physical or mental effect. For every stack beyond the first the damage dealt is increased by 50% and there is a 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% chance to remove an additional effect.

You must have at least 1 stack of Miasma Engine to use this talent.
value.name: Fumigate

value.info_text:
Allows you to create therapeutic tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Fiery Salve

* Botanical Shell

* Second Skin

* Alchemist's Helper

* Moss Tread

* Healing Salve

* Antimagic Shell

* Water Salve

* Frost Salve

* Fungal Web

* Air Recycler

* Poison Groove

* Power Distributor

* Viral Injector

* Unstoppable Force Salve

* Pain Suppressor Salve

* …perhaps more to discover…

Allows you to create chemical tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Fireproof Coating

* Waterproof Coating

* Black Light Emitter

* Rustproof Coating

* Alchemist's Helper

* Acid Groove

* Flash Powder

* White Light Emitter

* Corrosive Shell

* Winterchill Edge

* Toxic Shell

* Itching Powder

* …perhaps more to discover…

Allows you to create explosive tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

value2.name: Explosives

value.info_text:
You mount a grenade launcher on your steamgun that launches high explosive rounds. Each time you fire your steamgun, you fire a grenade at the target that explodes for 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% steamgun damage in radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3.

This talent also reinforces the armor of you and your minions to give you immunity to your own grenades.

You can only fire a single grenade once every 6 turns.
value.name: Grenade Launcher

value.info_text:
You line your armor with explosive plating that detonates when struck. On taking a melee or ranged hit that deals more than 8% of your maximum life a plate detonates, reducing the damage taken by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% and triggering a grenade attack in a radius 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 cone projected at the target dealing 33%, 46%, 54%, 60%, 65% of its usual damage.

This cannot trigger more than once per turn.

You have up to 3 plates at a time, and regain one every 8, 7, 6, 4, 3 turns.
value.name: Reactive Armor

value.info_text:
You load advanced grenades into your launcher.

Incendiary Grenade: Deals fire damage over 3 turns, increasing damage taken by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Chemical Grenade: Deals acid damage and slows targets by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 6 turns.

Shock Grenade: Deals lightning damage and shocks targets for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns, reducing stun and pin resistance by 50%.

You can only choose a single type of grenade at a time.
value.name: Sapper

value.info_text:
You load a magazine of 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 grenades into your launcher, causing your next 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 shots to fire a random grenade type in place of your usual Grenade Launcher.

While the magazine is loaded your attack speed is increased by 20%, 36%, 45%, 50%, 54%.

Your Grenade Launcher talent must be on cooldown to use this talent, and the magazine will only last for 6 turns or until you equip a Heavy Weapon.
value.name: Barrage

value.info_text: Entering the mind of your foe you manipulate it to make it lose hope of defeating you, reducing all its damage by 40% for 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns.
value.name: No Hope

value2.info_text: Entering the mind of your foe you manipulate it to make it loose hope of defeating you, reducing all its damage by 40% for 3, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns.
value2.name: No Hope

value.info_text:
You open all steam valves at once, releasing a radius 3 wave of superheated steam around yourself which deals 227, 308, 371, 424, 471 fire damage (but can not be a critical hit).

If you had at least 35 steam, the vapours will be so hot that they can burn sensory organs, blinding affected creatures for 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.

The effects scale with your current steam value; at 1 steam they are only 15% as effective as at 50 or more (current factor 100%).
value.name: Emergency Steam Purge

value2.info_text:
You open all steam valves at once, releasing a radius 3 wave of superheated steam around yourself which deals 299, 406, 488, 558, 620 fire damage.

If you had at least 50 steam, the vapours will be so hot that they can burn sensory organs, blinding affected creatures for 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.

The effects scale with your current steam value; at 1 steam they are only 15% as effective as at 100 (current factor 100%).
value2.name: Emergency Steam Purge

value.info_text:
You link your weapons to your steam generators, using them to load ammunition and improve the power of your weapons.

Each time you fire your Steamgun, you have a 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% chance to reload 1 Heavy Weapon ammo.

Each time you fire a Heavy Weapon you reload 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 ammo.

This also increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30 when using steamguns or heavy weapons.
value.name: Autoloader

value.info_text:
Current exoskeleton life: 0/278, 0/377, 0/453, 0/518, 0/576

You craft a set of steam powered armor that fits over your regular armor, enhancing your defense. The armor has 278, 377, 453, 518, 576 life, and 50% of all damage taken is redirected to it.

Your powered armour repairs 5% of it’s maximum life each turn, and each time you spend steam it will be repaired for 117%, 174%, 218%, 255%, 288% of the steam cost.

The armor's maximum life will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Exoskeleton

value.info_text:
Enhance your vision for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns, giving you vision of all targets in range 11, 17, 21, 25, 28, even through walls. While the goggles are active you also spot flaws in your opponent's defenses, increasing your resistance penetration by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56%.

In addition, the goggles passively increase your stealth, invisibility and trap detection by 13, 26, 34, 40, 45.
value.name: Hypervision Goggles

value.info_text:
Prepare a defensive device that stores an electrical charge for 5 turns.

If your life falls below 0 while the AED is active it will activate to shock you back into life, negating the triggering attack, restoring 277, 376, 452, 517, 575 life and dealing 220, 298, 359, 411, 456 lightning damage in radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 that dazes affected enemies for 3 turns.

If the AED does not activate, the cooldown is reduced by 15 turns.

The healing and damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: AED

value.info_text:
Increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30 when using steamguns.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3.
value.name: Steamgun Mastery

value2.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamguns.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3.
value2.name: Steamgun Mastery

value.info_text:
You gain the ability to equip one of 3 heavy weapons listed below, temporarily granting you a special attack. Heavy weapons are significantly more powerful than a steamgun, but drain 3 steam per turn and require heavy ammunition to fire. You can store up to 5 ammunition at a time, and regenerate 1 every 3 turns while a heavy weapon is not equiped.

Flamethrower: An incendiary device which projects streams of liquid flame at your foes. Deals 100% fire damage over 3 turns to those in radius 5. The flamethrower ignores armor, has perfect accuracy, and deals 98, 104, 107, 109, 111 to 138, 146, 150, 153, 156 damage.

Shockstaff: An electrically charged baton wielded in close combat. Deals 100% lightning damage enemies in a frontal arc, as well as reducing the damage they deal by 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28% for 2 turns. The shockstaff deals 104, 110, 113, 115, 116 to 146, 154, 158, 161, 163 damage, and has high armor penetration and critical chance.

Boltgun: A multi-barreled steamgun that launches high velocity, chemical infused bolts. Fires twice for 100% acid damage, as well as reducing all saves by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45 for 5 turns. The boltgun deals 79, 82, 85, 87, 88 to 110, 115, 119, 121, 123 damage and has high accuracy and armor penetration.

The damage dealt by your Heavy Weapons will increase with your Cunning, and are treated as Steamguns for the purposes of weapon mastery talents.
value.name: Heavy Weapons

value.info_text:
Your advanced training unlocks specialised techniques, triggering an effect based on your current heavy weapon at the cost of 1 heavy weapon ammunition.

Flamethrower: Sweep your flamethrower across the ground, dealing 100%, 122%, 138%, 151%, 164% weapon damage as fire and raising a length 3, 5, 7, 7, 9 wall of fire for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. Those inside the wall take 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 fire damage and have their fire resistance reduced by 18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% for 2 turns.

Shockstaff: Slam your staff into the target, creating a radius 3 shockwave that deals 200%, 222%, 238%, 251%, 264% weapon damage as lightning and stuns those within for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. If they are out of melee range, you can charge up to 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 tiles towards them.

Boltgun: Fire an explosive bolt that deals 337%, 385%, 423%, 454%, 482% weapon damage as acid in radius 2, randomly blinding or disarming those within for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage dealt by the fire wall and chemical cloud and the chance to apply their effects will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Heavy Weapon Expertise

value.info_text:
Your skill with heavy weapons allows you to augment your defenses based on your current heavy weapon.

Flamethrower: Vent smoke from your flamethrower that obscures your position, giving you 17%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 39% chance to evade melee and ranged attacks.

Shockstaff: Sheathe yourself in a protective field of lightning, increasing armor by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45 and giving you a 13%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 46% chance on taking damage from an adjacent enemy to shock them for 50% staff damage as lightning (up to once per turn per target).

Boltgun: Each time your boltgun fires it injects you with a beneficial form of its chemicals, restoring 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 life and reducing the duration of a random negative physical effect by 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The armor and healing will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Automated Defenses

value.info_text:
Push your heavy weapon beyond its normal limits to trigger a powerful effect. This will immediately disable your heavy weapon and expends all remaining ammunition.

Flamethrower: Detonate your fuel tanks, creating a radius 4 explosion that launches you to a chosen tile in range 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Enemies caught within the explosion take 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 fire damage, and further fire damage equal to 56%, 84%, 105%, 122%, 137% of their current burning damage from the volatile fuel.

Shockstaff: Drive your staff into the ground, discharging all remaining power to deal 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% weapon damage as lightning in radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 5. Those struck will be knocked back 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 tiles, and if they strike a wall they will emit a static pulse dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage in radius 1 that dazes for 2 turns.

Boltgun: Overcharge your boltgun, firing a single deadly bolt dealing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% weapon damage as acid in a piercing line. For each negative physical or mental effect on the target, they take an additional 6%, 12%, 16%, 20%, 23% damage (to a maximum of 33%, 62%, 84%, 102%, 119%) and the duration of the negative effect is increased by 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.
value.name: Safety Override

value.info_text:
Using your Block talent surrounds you in a static barrier for 4 turns, increasing all resistances by 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28%. If an enemy deals damage to you, the barrier will shock them for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% shield damage.

This effect cannot damage the same target more than once per turn, and will not interact with Counterstrike.

You now also use your Cunning in place of Strength when equipping shields as well as when calculating shield damage.
value.name: Static Shock

value.info_text:
You project a powerful blast of magnetic energy from your shield in radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 around you. Enemies caught within are knocked back 4, 5, 6, 7, 7 tiles and take 211%, 249%, 278%, 303%, 325% shield damage as lightning, and any projectiles will be destroyed.

While this talent is not on cooldown, you also project a magnetic field from your shield, reducing the speed of incoming projectiles by 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58% and your chance to be critically hit by 4%, 10%, 13%, 15%, 16%.
value.name: Magnetic Field

value.info_text:
Mount capacitors to your shield that dampen the impact of attacks, increasing block value by 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46% and storing 100% of the damage blocked as an electrical charge (to a maximum of 423, 573, 690, 789, 876).

Activating this ability discharges blocked damage, firing a bolt of lightning dealing 156%, 179%, 197%, 212%, 225% shield damage as lightning to the first target, then projecting a bolt of lightning that arcs to 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 other targets dealing lightning damage equal to the stored amount.

If at maximum charge, this also dazes for 2 turns and the shield strike is a guarenteed critical hit.

The maximum damage you can absorb will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Capacitor Discharge

value.info_text:
Project a radius 3 electric field from your shield lasting 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. Enemies within this field will take an automatic shield strike for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% lightning damage each turn, while allies will gain flat damage reduction equal to 36%, 54%, 64%, 70%, 75% of block value.

All damage reduced by this effect will be stored for Capacitor Discharge.
value.name: Lightning Web

value.info_text:
You build a mighty mechanical arachnid to assist you in combat. You can equip the mecharachnid with 2 steamguns, ammunition, and armor of your choice.

If your mecharachnid is dead, this will resurrect it with 53%, 69%, 81%, 92%, 101% of its maximum life.

Your mecharachnid has level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 Steamgun Mastery, Steamsaw Mastery, Combat Accuracy and Armor Training.
value.name: Mecharachnid

value.info_text: You equip your mecharachnid with a stormcoil generator, a mechanical device that projects a powerful electrical field. On taking a hit greater than 15% of its maximum life, the excess damage will be reduced by 22%, 43%, 54%, 60%, 65% and converted into energy, giving your mecharachnid 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% increased global speed for 2 turns.
value.name: Stormcoil Generator

value.info_text:
You craft a new chassis for your mecharachnid, allowing you to tailor it to different situations. Each chassis grants the mecharachnid a new talent category, the ability to attach a weapon to their tail, as well as granting them 3, 6, 9, 12, 15 class talent points to spend in a new category based off their chassis.

You can choose from the 2 chassis below by activating this talent outside of combat (default chassis: Assault)

  • Assault: An armored chassis focused on close combat and defenses, specialising in wielding a steamsaw.
  • Armament: A heavily armed chassis focused on ranged combat, specialising in wielding an additional steamgun.

Tail weapons do not attack by default, and are instead used for special talents.
value.name: Mecharachnid Chassis

value.info_text: Leap into your mecharachnid, assuming direct control of it for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns. While piloting it, all damage dealt is increased by 14%, 28%, 38%, 46%, 52%, resistances are increased by 13%, 23%, 30%, 35%, 39%, and all of its talents cooldown twice as fast.
value.name: Mecharachnid Piloting

value.info_text:
Allows the use of Technomancy spells.

Grants a magical steam reserve that regenerates 1 steam per 10 mana spent.

Grants Spellpower based on current steam level (currently 60; 100% steam filled).

Outside of combat, you relax and let your steam reserve slowly wither away.

Metal Arcane Power!
value.name: Arcane Dynamo

value.info_text: Enhance your grenade with an incendiary agent that burns through armor, dealing fire damage over 3 turns and increasing damage taken while burning by -5%.
value.name: Incendiary Grenade

value.info_text: Enhance your grenade with incapacitating chemicals that deal acid damage and reduce global speed by -2% for 6 turns.
value.name: Chemical Grenade

value.info_text: Enhance your grenade with an electrical charge, causing it to deal lightning damage and shock targets for 1 turns, reducing stun and pin resistance by 50%.
value.name: Shock Grenade

value.info_text:
You replace your steamgun with a mighty steampowered flamethrower to burn your foes to ash.

Equipping or unequipping the flamethrower takes no time. Firing your Steamgun will immediately unequip your flamethrower.

Effective Flamethrower Stats:

Range: 5

Net Damage: 2, 10, 31, 57, 88 - 2, 15, 43, 80, 123

Accuracy: 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

APR: 1000

Crit Chance: +0%, +0%, +15%, +30%, +45%

Uses Stats: 175% Cun
value.name: Flamethrower

value.info_text: Fire a jet of flame, dealing 100% weapon damage as fire over 3 turns.
value.name: Flame Jet

value.info_text:
You replace your steamgun with a lightning-charged staff to engage in close combat.

Equipping or unequipping the shockstaff takes no time. Firing your steamgun will immediately unequip your shockstaff.

Effective Shockstaff Stats:

Range: 0

Net Damage: 2, 11, 33, 61, 94 - 3, 16, 47, 86, 132

Accuracy: 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

APR: 3

Crit Chance: +0%, +0%, +15%, +30%, +45%

Uses Stats: 200% Cun
value.name: Shockstaff

value.info_text:
Sweep your shockstaff, striking all enemies in a frontal cone for 100% weapon damage as lightning and reducing their damage dealt by 3% for 2 turns.

While active this replace your normal melee attack.

You can charge up to 5 tiles towards a target to use this attack.
value.name: Stormstrike

value.info_text:
You replace your steamgun with a multi-barreled bolt launcher, firing deadly chemical-infused flechettes.

Equipping or unequipping the boltgun takes no time. Firing your Steamgun will immediately unequip your boltgun.

Effective Boltgun Stats:

Range: 10

Net Damage: 3, 10, 27, 48, 73 - 4, 14, 38, 68, 102

Accuracy: 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

APR: 1

Crit Chance: +0%, +0%, +9%, +24%, +39%

Uses Stats: 100% Cun
value.name: Boltgun

value.info_text: Fire two chemical flechettes, dealing 100% weapon damage as acid and reducing saves by 0, 1, 1, 2, 3 for 5 turns.
value.name: Flechette Burst

value.info_text: Fire a missile dealing steamgun damage as fire in radius 2.
value.name: Rocket Launcher

value.info_text: Gain a second steamgun, firing twice with your basic shots.
value.name: Dual Steamgun

value.info_text:
Throw a cone of flame with radius 3, dealing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 fire damage and taunting targets.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Flamethrower

value.info_text:
Project a radius 1 vortex of superheated air, dealing 4.86, 8.69, 15, 22, 29 fire damage and pulling targets towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Flame Vortex

value.info_text: Fire your twin-linked gauss cannons, dealing 100% steamgun damage as lightning in a piercing beam that bypasses all armor. This does not harm friendly targets.
value.name: Gauss Cannon

value.info_text: Detonate your missile!
value.name: Detonate

value.info_text: Link to the summoner.
value.name: Mecharachnid Link

value.info_text: Attach the chosen weapon to your tail.
value.name: Tail Attachment

value.info_text:
Allows you to create smithed tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

This talent is required for the following tinkers (you still need to learn/find the schematics):

* Armour Reinforcement

* Crystal Plating

* Winterchill Edge

* Toxic Cannister Launcher

* Viral Injector

* …perhaps more to discover…

Allows you to create smithed tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

You will learn a new schematic at level 1.

Each other talent level, you have a 20% chance to learn one more random schematic, if you have not gained it by level 5 you are guaranteed it (unless all are known).

Allows you to create electrical tinkers of level 1, 2, 3, 5, 6.

value.info_text:
Increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30 when using steamguns.

When your bullets hit a target you instinctively reach out to the impact and use the kinetic force to project a mindstar attack doing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% damage (guaranteed hit), if you wield one in the offhand.

This projection requires a pure mindstar; it will not work if extended into a psiblade.

Also activable for a shot that deals 140%, 162%, 178%, 191%, 204% weapon damage as mind damage.
value.name: Psyshot

value2.info_text:
Increases Physical Power by 13, 26, 39, 52, 65 and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% when using steamguns.

When your bullets hit a target your instinctively reach out to the impact and use the kinetic force to project a mindstar attack doing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% damage (guaranteed hit), if you wield one in the offhand.

This projection requires a pure mindstar, it will no work if extended into a psiblade.

Also activable for a shoot that deals 140%, 162%, 178%, 191%, 204% weapon damage as mind damage.
value2.name: Psyshot

value.info_text: Deploy a turret mounted with a steamgun that fires at foes within range. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value.name: Steamgun Turret

value.info_text: Deploy a turret mounted with a flamethrower, scorching and taunting nearby targets. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value.name: Flame Turret

value.info_text: Deploy a turret that emits a healing mist in radius 3. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value.name: Medic Turret

value.info_text:
You are able to deploy turrets, stationary constructs that defend you in combat. Turrets last 10 turns, and deploying a turret places the others on a 5 turn cooldown.

Each point in this talent teaches you a new turret type.

At level 1 you can use Steamgun turrets.

At level 3 you can use Flame turrets.

At level 5 you can use Medic turrets.

This talent also increases the Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning of all Turrets by 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 and scales with Steampower.
value.name: Deploy Turret

value.info_text:
Send a surge of power into all turrets in sight, extending their duration by 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 turns and granting them a charged shield absorbing 423, 573, 690, 789, 876 damage for 10 turns. While the shield holds, each turn the turret will project a bolt of lightning dealing 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 lightning damage to a random enemy in radius 6, with a 25% chance to daze.

The effects will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Overclock

value.info_text:
Upgrade the target turret, granting it 29%, 59%, 83%, 102%, 120% increased maximum life and enhanced abilities based on type:

Steamgun: Gains a second steamgun dealing 14%, 29%, 41%, 51%, 60% damage, and every 3 turns will fire a rocket dealing 87%, 177%, 249%, 306%, 360% steamgun damage as fire in radius 2.

Flame: Increases damage by 14%, 29%, 41%, 51%, 60%, range by 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, and every 3 turns will project a vortex of superheated air that drags targets within range 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 towards the turret as well as dealing normal flamethrower damage.

Medic: Increases healing on affected targets by 14%, 29%, 41%, 51%, 60%, and has a 9%, 19%, 27%, 34%, 40% chance to cleanse a negative effect each turn.
value.name: Upgrade

value.info_text: Deploy a defensive emplacement around you, summoning 2 guardian turrets in adjacent tiles for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Guardian turrets redirect 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58% of all damage taken by other adjacent allies (other than fellow guardian turrets) to themselves, and each is armed with a powerful turret capable of firing piercing bullets.
value.name: Hunker Down

value.info_text:
You rush toward your foe, readying your shot. If you reach the enemy, you release the shot, imbuing it with great power.

The shot does 161%, 186%, 205%, 222%, 236% weapon damage and knocks back your target by 1, 1, 2, 2, 2.

The cooldown of this talent is reduced by 1 each time you move.

This requires a sling to use.
value.name: Bull Shot

value2.info_text:
You rush toward your foe, readying your shot. If you reach the enemy, you release the shot, imbuing it with great power.

The shot does 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% weapon damage and knocks back your target by 1, 1, 2, 2, 2.

The cooldown of this talent is reduced by 1 each time you move.

This requires a sling to use.
value2.name: Bull Shot

value.info_text:
Increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and physical power by 30 when using bows.

Also, increases your reload rate by 0, 1, 2, 2, 3.

value.info_text:
Fire a precise shot dealing 171%, 196%, 215%, 232%, 246% weapon damage, with 100 increased accuracy. This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

Only usable against marked targets, and consumes the mark on hit.
value.name: Headshot

value2.info_text:
Fire a precise shot dealing 171%, 196%, 215%, 232%, 246% weapon damage, with 4, 10, 20, 30, 40 increased armor penetration and 100 increased accuracy. This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

Only usable against marked targets, and consumes the mark on hit.

The armor penetration increases with your Dexterity.
value2.name: Headshot

value.info_text:
You fire a disabling shot at a target's throat (or equivalent), dealing 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% weapon damage and silencing them for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

If the target is marked, you consume the mark to fire two secondary shots at their arms and legs (or other appendages) dealing 17%, 20%, 23%, 25%, 27% damage, reducing their movement speed by 50% and disarming them for the duration.

The status chance increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Called Shots

value2.info_text:
You fire a disabling shot at a target's throat (or equivalent), dealing 110%, 127%, 140%, 151%, 161% weapon damage and silencing them for 2, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

If the target is marked, you consume the mark to fire two secondary shots at their arms and legs (or other appendages) dealing 27%, 31%, 35%, 37%, 40% damage, reducing their movement speed by 50% and disarming them for the duration.

The status chance increases with your Accuracy.
value2.name: Called Shots

value.info_text:
Attempt to finish off a wounded enemy, striking them with both weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% increased by 50% if their life is below 30%. A target brought below 20% of its maximum life must make a physical save against your Accuracy or be instantly slain.

You may take advantage of finishing your foe this way to activate stealth (if known).
value.name: Coup de Grace

value2.info_text:
Attempt to finish off a wounded enemy, striking them with both weapons for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage, plus additional physical damage for each hit that lands equal to 11%, 15%, 18%, 20%, 21% of their missing life (divided by rank: from 1 (critter) to 5 (elite boss)). A target brought below 20% of its maximum life may be instantly slain.

You may take advantage of finishing your foe this way to activate stealth (if known).
value2.name: Coup de Grace

value.info_text:
Take a defensive stance to resist the onslaught of your foes.

While wounded, you gain all damage resistance equal to 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of your missing health.

(So if you have lost 70% of your life, you gain 19%, 24%, 28%, 32%, 35% all resistance.)

In addition, your all damage resistance cap increases 19%, 34%, 44%, 51%, 57% closer to 100%.

This consumes stamina rapidly the longer it is sustained (1.0 stamina/turn, increasing by 0.3/turn).

The resist is recalculated each time you take damage.
value.name: True Grit

value2.info_text:
Take a defensive stance to resist the onslaught of your foes.

While wounded, you gain all damage resistance equal to 27%, 34%, 40%, 45%, 50% of your missing health.

(So if you have lost 70% of your life, you gain 19%, 24%, 28%, 32%, 35% all resistance.)

In addition, your all damage resistance cap increases 19%, 34%, 44%, 51%, 57% closer to 100%.

This consumes stamina rapidly the longer it is sustained (-1 stamina increasing by -0.3/turn).

The effects are refreshed at the start of each turn.
value2.name: True Grit

value.info_text: Shout your warcry in a frontal cone of radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9. Any targets caught inside will be confused (50% confusion power) for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

When you are attacked in melee, you have a 19%, 21%, 23%, 25%, 26% chance to deflect the attack with your shield, completely evading it.

In addition, as long as you are wearing armour no heavier than leather, you gain 5, 11, 13, 15, 16 Armour and 13%, 20%, 23%, 25%, 26% Armour hardiness.

The chance to deflect increases with your Cunning.

value.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 25%, 41%, 47%, 50%, 52%.

Whenever your life falls below 50%, your life regeneration increases by 74, 97, 114, 128, 140 for 8 turns (594, 774, 909, 1021, 1118 total). This effect can only happen once every 15 turns.

The regeneration scales with your Constitution.
value.name: Vitality

value2.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.

Additionally, when your life falls below 50%, you heal for a base 19, 22, 24, 26, 27 health plus 1.0%, 1.5%, 1.8%, 2.0%, 2.2% of your maximum life (currently 29, 37, 42, 46, 49 total) each turn for 8 turns. This effect can only happen once every 15 turns.

The base healing scales with your Constitution.
value2.name: Vitality

value.info_text:
Enemies are intimidated by your very presence.

Enemies within radius 6 have their Physical Power, Mindpower, and Spellpower reduced by 22, 30, 37, 42, 47.

The power of the intimidation effect improves with your Physical power
value.name: Daunting Presence

value2.info_text:
Enemies are intimidated by how composed you remain under fire. When you take more then 5% of your maximum life in a single hit, all enemies in a radius of 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 will be intimidated, reducing their Physical Power, Mindpower, and Spellpower by 22, 30, 37, 42, 47 for 4 turns.

If your health drops below 418, 328, 277, 245, 223, you'll be unable to maintain your daunting presence, and the sustain will deactivate.

The power of the intimidation effect improves with your Physical power, and it's chance to affect your enemies improves with your Strength.
value2.name: Daunting Presence

value.info_text:
You release a surge of adrenaline that increases your Physical Power by 19, 24, 29, 32, 36 for 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns. While the effect is active, you may continue to fight beyond the point of exhaustion.

You may continue to use stamina based talents while at zero stamina at the cost of life.

The Physical Power increase will scale with your Constitution.

Using this talent does not take a turn.
value.name: Adrenaline Surge

value2.info_text:
You release a surge of adrenaline that increases your Physical Power by 11, 14, 17, 19, 21 for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. While the effect is active, you may continue to fight beyond the point of exhaustion.

Your stamina based sustains will not be disabled if your stamina reaches zero, and you may continue to use stamina based talents while at zero stamina at the cost of life.

The Physical Power increase will scale with your Constitution.

Using this talent does not take a turn.
value2.name: Adrenaline Surge

If another creature is in the way, it will also be pushed away.

The Knockback chance increases with your Accuracy or your Physical Power, whichever is greater.

A powerful concussive punch that deals 105%, 124%, 139%, 151%, 162% weapon damage to your target. If the punch hits, all targets in a radius of 1 will take 39, 50, 59, 66, 72 to 193, 251, 294, 330, 361 damage, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

The area damage will scale with your Strength, and the radius will increase by 1 per combo point.

Using this talent removes your combo points.

value2.info_text:

Using this talent removes your combo points and you must have at least 1 combo point to use it.
value.name: Butterfly Kick

value2.info_text:
You spin into a flying leap and deliver a powerful kick dealing 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% weapon damage to all enemies in a radius of 1 as you land. The range will increase by 1 per combo point and total damage will increase by 10% per combo point.

Using this talent removes your combo points and you must have at least 1 combo point to use it.

A vicious finishing strike that deals 211%, 249%, 278%, 303%, 325% damage increased by 20% per combo point you have up to a max of 423%, 499%, 557%, 607%, 650%. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Killing a target with Haymaker will instantly restore 3%, 7%, 10%, 12%, 15% to 14%, 16%, 18%, 20%, 21% of your maximum stamina, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
value.name: Haymaker

value2.info_text:
A vicious finishing strike that deals 211%, 249%, 278%, 303%, 325% damage increased by 20% per combo point you have up to a max of 423%, 499%, 557%, 607%, 650%. If the target ends up with low enough life (<20%), it might be instantly killed.

Killing a target with Haymaker will instantly restore 3%, 7%, 10%, 12%, 15% to 14%, 16%, 18%, 20%, 21% of your maximum stamina, depending on the amount of combo points you've accumulated.

Using this talent removes your combo points.
value2.name: Haymaker

value.info_text:
Make a melee attack for 100% damage and then attempt to grapple a target up to one size category larger than yourself for 5 turns. A grappled opponent will be unable to move, take 58, 79, 95, 109, 121 damage each turn, and 7%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% of the damage you receive from any source will be redirected to them as physical damage.

Any movement from the target or you will break the grapple. Maintaining a grapple drains 6 stamina per turn.

You may only grapple a single target at a time, and using any targeted unarmed talent on a target that you're not grappling will break the grapple.
value.name: Clinch

value2.info_text:
Make a melee attack for 100% damage and then attempt to grapple a target up to one size category larger than yourself for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. A grappled opponent will be unable to move, take 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 damage each turn, and 7%, 14%, 20%, 25%, 30% of the damage you receive from any source will be redirected to them. Any movement from the target or you will break the grapple. Maintaining a grapple drains 6 stamina per turn.

You may only grapple a single target at a time, and using any targeted unarmed talent on a target that you're not grappling will break the grapple.
value2.name: Clinch

Talent Level 5: Reduces global action speed by 0%, 0%, 0%, 44%, 49%

If at least 1 other enemy is hit the thrown enemy will be shaken by the impact losing a full turn.

You can only throw enemies that could move normally.

value.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While dual wielding or using a shield, the chance is reduced to 50% for both weapons.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Earthen Missiles, Flame, Lightning
value.name: Arcane Combat

value2.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown, but only works if the spell is not already cooling down.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While wielding a shield, the chance is reduced by one quarter.

While dual wielding, the chance is reduced by half for both weapons.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Earthen Missiles, Flame, Lightning, Pulverizing Auger

Each time you crit with a melee blow, you will unleash a radius 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 ball of arcane damage, doing 66, 89, 107, 122, 136.

The bonus scales with your Spellpower and talent level.

If you are using a shield this will only occur 50% of the time.

If you are dual wielding this will only occur 50% of the time.

At level 5 the ball becomes radius 2.

value.info_text:
You have trained to be very light on your feet and have conditioned your reflexes to react faster than thought to damage you take.

While this talent is active, you instantly react to any direct damage (not from status effects, etc.) that would hit you for at least 26%, 19%, 16%, 14%, 13% of your maximum life.

This requires 3.3, 4.2, 4.9, 5.5, 5.9 stamina and reduces the damage by 15%, 23%, 27%, 29%, 31%.

Your reactions are too slow for this if you are wearing heavy armour.

The damage reduction improves with your Defense.

If any damage was successfully blocked this effect will be removed at the start of your turn.

If the shield has damage resistance to the blocked damage type the block value is increased by 50%.

Current Bonuses: error!
